This modem/router is very sturdy. It is bigger than I expected, although it doesn't take much space (due to high tower design). It seems durable and quality made. TP-Link products have been excellent in my experience - ALL TP-Link products I own have performed as advertised or better than I expected, so I trust the name.3. FAST. The speed was as advertised. Both upload/download speed was far faster than my previous modem and router. Movies stream faster and downloading was much faster than my previous one. So if you are looking for fast cable modem/router combo product, this is probably one of the most decent ones out there.4. PRICE. OK, this is where you might have to decide whether this is worth it. You could purchase BOTH basic cable modem and router separately for $100.00. This was what I have done. I did not want to pay monthly charge for my cable modem, so I purchased one for $49.99 and also bought decent router for $50.00. And it met all my family needs (4 smartphones, 3 tablets, 4 laptops). We were good overall. So if you do NOT NEED high end speed, then purchasing them separately might be better option.5. NO DSL. One of the drawbacks for this kind of cable modem/router combo products is that it will NOT work with DSL modems. If you decide to switch to DSL, then you cannot use this product at all. But if you purchase cable modem and router (both cable and dsl ready) separately, you have the option to use the router.All in all, this is a great product for cable modem/router users. But for some, this is cost prohibitive (that's why 4 stars). But of the cost is not an issue, then this will be a great product for you. Highly Recommended!

The benefit of vitamin supplements is still being debated. My friend, who is a nurse, told me that 75% of the vitamins are not absorbed in the stomach and passes through. In other words, it has minimum benefit. Then there are those who by experience, the vitamin supplements are helping them.The BEST way to get vitamins is through foods. Generally, if you eat healthy, then the food you eat will provide sufficient vitamins you need. But if your lifestyle is such that healthy diet is not feasible, then certainly taking vitamins will help (even though only a little). Doctors also warned that taking too much vitamins is not good for you. Vitamin-supplements cannot REPLACE your food.IF you must take vitamins, then consider food based vitamins, and not synthetic ones. Food based vitamins get their vitamins from food, but synthetic vitamins are produced in the laboratories.This Green Source Multivitamin is food based, therefore it is easily absorbed in your body and processed. Because it is food based, once you open up the bottle, you must store it in the refrigerator. One serving is 3 caplets, so even though it has 240 pills, it is worth of 80 days.I did note the spike in energy level the first time I used it (3 caplets), I had not expectation, but it made me less tired throughout the day. But after few days, you cannot tell the difference, because your body is now used to it.Overall, Green Source Multi-vitamin works better than synthetic ones. But I give 4 stars, because of the price. It is a bit expensive. If you have to take vitamins, and the price is not the important thing, then this one might work for you. Highly recommended!

Many of us already own some kind of electronic brush over manual ones. But Braun Oral-B and Philips Sonicare are two well-known electronic tooth brushes on the market. But which is one is better? Well, that is up to you - up to your preference. Both are much better than manual ones. Some prefer Oral-B, others Sonicare. The difference lies in their mode of cleaning. Oral-B uses oscillation and Sonicare uses vibration. As for Sonicare Healthy White+:1. THOROUGH Cleaning. If you follow the instruction, you will feel the cleanness of your teeth. NOTE: The instruction recommends to place the bristles against the teeth at a slight angle (45 degrees), pressing firmly to make the bristles reach the gumline or slightly beneath the gumline for thorough cleaning.2. TWO Brushing Modes. Clean Mode (default mode)  cleanses the whole mouth (2 mins, divided into 4  30 second timer), focuses on plaque removal. White Mode is longer than 2 mins and focuses on polishing and brightening your front teeth. Indeed, I have tried it for 3 weeks (though, you can see it 1 week) and my teeth does seem to be whiter (ie, not bleached white, but polished)  and I am an avid coffee drinker!3. LONG Battery Life. Compared to my Oral-B electronic tooth brush, Sonicare holds the charge longer by few days. In one month use, I have only recharged once.4. TRAVEL Case & Hygienic Travel Cap. This is great for your travel. The case is handsome looking and holds everything you need.I am an Oral-B user for years. It has done well. And I have tried Sonicare for one full month and I can see why people like it (my wife uses it). I see strengths for both products. Sonicare feels gentler than Oral-B. But they BOTH clean well. If you prefer gentler feeling of cleaning and simple electronic tooth brush then, consider this wonderful product. Highly recommended!

I like grilling, but sometimes both gas and charcoal grilling can be too much hassle. Also, for obvious reasons you cannot grill inside your home. This George Foreman grill does not replace your tried-and-true gas/charcoal grills. But it is a great alternative or addition to what you already own.POSITIVES:1. Easy to Cook and Grill. Its built-in Temperature Setting (1-5) helps you to cook in proper setting. For meats (steak, salmon, and hamburgers, etc) are set to "5" according to the cooking chart (in their website), and hot dogs, boneless pork chops, thin fish fillets, and various vegetables are set for "4." And because it is electric grill, the heat is evenly distributed and fast, ensuring thorough cook of the meat. I grilled frozen hamburger patties and they were cooked fast and evenly.2. Easy to Clean. Because the grill top is ceramic coated, it is much easier to clean than metal ones. Just wet paper towel or a wet sponge easily removes grill residues from the plate.3. Easy to Use Indoor or Outdoor. During winter, or any other occasion where outdoor grill is not feasible, this grill can be easily removed from the stand, and be placed on the island for easy grilling.4. Easy to Assemble. Although the assembly instruction does not have a diagram, if you follow the instruction, you will be OK. Assembly took only 5 minutes. BUT I do wish that the manual had a diagram for assembly.NEGATIVES.1. Although it is not a big deal for me, clamshell design of the lid/cover would have been better. When you have to use two hands, you need to place the cover somewhere else. A bit inconvenient.2. It feels flimsy. This does not mean cheap. The materials seem to be good, not great, but good. But due to single stand with four pedestal feet, it does move (or wobble a little). But it will not tip or tilt over.3. Lack of cooking instruction/manual. The provided manual did not have temperature setting instruction or a cooking chart. So initially, I did not know the setting 1-5 meant. But visiting their website, I was able to print out the cooking chart for this model. Visit: georgeforemancooking.com . Then: click "Grills" --> "Indoor/Outdoor Grills" --> "12+ Serving Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill" --> scroll down a little and Click on "GFO201RX Use and Care Manual" --> from pages 6 - 9, you will find a cooking chart and recipes. You can download its .pdf file and print it out.All in all, this is a decent sized (a family of 4) electric grill that can be used inside and outside. It cooks well, fast, easy to clean, and convenient. Highly recommended!

Eton is known for producing quality emergency radios. First to produce shortwave radio (1986) and first to produce hand-crank emergency radio (2002). It also partners with Red Cross to produce these radios. As for this model FR1, it comes with many features that will be handy during emergency situations. Great for any family or even a college student who is away.1. COMPACT. It measures 2 1/2" (w) x 5 1/4" (h) x 1 5/8" (d). It could be stored anywhere. In your family emergency kit or in a tool box.2. STURDY. Being compact does not mean cheap. It is made of strong plastic. It will withstand casual bumps and bruises. BUT it is not shatterproof or waterproof. Best used in indoors or outside away from exposure to rain or snow.3. GREAT FEATURES. This little thing has: [1] LED Flash Light, [2] Digital FM/AM/WB (Weather Band) channels, [3] DC Rechargeable micro USB port, [4] Hand-crank power, [5] USB connector for your smartphones, [6] Headphone jack and [7] Antenna.4. NOAA (National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration) Weather Band adjusts to your local weather station. The information is clear and up to the minute data. Great to have during power outages due to severe weather or natural disaster.5. DIGITAL BANDS. FM/AM/WB are adjusted with digital bands. It is easier and accurate. You will receive clear sounds. All channels come through clearly.6. HAND-CRANK. Initially I wasn't sure whether it will hold. The handle is thin (1/8") with a knob at the end. BUT I soon discovered that the plastic while thin, was very strong and well grooved into the radio for support. It was easy to turn, but it will make a high pitched noise. I was able to turn for 4 mins without breaking anything and it did charge the radio.All in all, this is a great item for your emergency kit. Whether in your house, garage, glove box, or tool chest, this Eton FR1 is a must! Highly highly recommended!

My kids wanted a "magic wallet" that I have. And looking around, I found Coromose "magic wallet" fits the bill with quality and affordability. So I purchased 2 and my kids love it!!! They can easily put their bills inside the wallet (magically) and have the outer pockets for school IDs and what have you!They are attractive, thin, and made of soft man-made leather (not an animal skin). Seems sturdy enough for daily use. Highly recommended!

DISCLAIMER: The effectiveness of any supplement depends on various factors, such as, one's physiological make up, age, diet, and health. Therefore my review is based on one who is 48 years old, non-smoker, non-drinker, and who works out 3 times a week. Your result may vary.I always liked Cellucor products because they were effective and did not cause any side effect on my body. Perhaps you have used several products too and found something that worked for you. For me, Cellucor products are safe bet. For this product, SuperHD Thermogenic Fat Burner has been very good. Let me briefly explain:PROS:1. After 2 days of use, my body quickly adjusted. You should expect that first two days, you may feel slight jitters. So take one pill a day. So that your body will become use to it. After that, taking 1 pill in the morning (before breakfast), and 2nd pill in the afternoon will help you burn calories throughout the day.2. You will be alert, due to caffeine in the product. I did not have any headaches or stomach discomfort when I took the pills. So it was easy.3. It energized my workouts: both in cardio and strength exercises. I didn't feel sluggish (as I often feel when I work out), and I was able to focus and push through the workouts.4. I didn't crash after the workout. I felt energized throughout the day.NOTES:1. I felt that it could have been stronger in dosage. But I could see that Cellucor was on the side of caution.2. This supplement WILL NOT automatically make you lose weight. You must have healthy diet and regular workout regimen in order to see some results.All in all, happy with the product. BUT as mentioned earlier, your result may vary.

This is overall comfortable and decent task chair. But if you prefer tighter chair, then this is not it. If you are shorter than 5' 8" tall, then this task chair might be little big for you.  NOTE: The assembly required.1. COMFORTABLE. The mesh and the cushion are very comfortable. I did not feel fatigued or felt numbness on my buttocks or legs. And my back was cool  mesh being breathable.2. LUMBAR SUPPORT. I hurt lower back a couple of months ago [lumbar strain], and I needed a good support on my lower back. And this chair provides that needed lumbar support. Also, it is adjustable, so you can choose the best position for your lower back. Unlike other lumbar support, this does not dig into your back.3. REMOVABLE/ADJUSTABLE ARMS. This is removable and the height is adjustable. This is a great option for those who needs arm support. The plastic is strong and well-made.4. TILTED BACK. Unlike some other chairs, this has a tilted back design to relieve your back pain or just to relax your back.5. SMOOTH. The base (5 star designed) is sturdy and does not creak, it moves smoothly as you turn and move around the floor.The only concern is that this task chair might be too big for some. The depth of the chair might be little too deep for some users. If you put your back and hips all the way to the mesh, then the edge of the chair might lift your knees. And this can cause some fit issue.Best thing is that you visit one of the office supply stores and sit on some similar chairs for most comfortable sized chair and then order one online.However, the product itself is sturdy, comfortable, and well made. Highly recommended!

If you own a Surface 3, then you want to protect your investment. While Surface 3 is pretty sturdy (chassis is made of magnesium alloy and the screen is protected with Gorilla Glass), still if you want to protect further, then this Urban Armor Gear case is best bet. Compared to other cases out there, this case will definitely protect your Surface 3 from drops and abuses.1. FIT. The fit is perfect. All your buttons, cameras and ports are accessible. Buttons are covered, while ports and cameras are not. This is good design. It fits like a glove.2. FEEL. When you fit your Surface 3 in it, it feels real good and solid to hold. Not slippery at all. The "Frog Skin Grip" really helps to maintain the control of Surface 3 with ease.3. PROTECTION. It claims to have "military standard" in drop testing (810G-516.6), and it means it protects well from the shock (516.6) when dropped from 30" to 48" high to the concrete ground (tested 26 drops of corners, front and back, and side). You can clearly see that the corners are reinforced with thicker ratio. In short, as of now, there is no sturdier case than this one for your Surface 3. You will feel at ease.4. 3-POSITION STAND. It works well, but you still feel that if used a lot, it may break. Don't get me wrong, both the aluminum stand and plastic hinge are strong and not cheap, but you just feel that compared to the rest of the case, it might be vulnerable. So do not apply too much pressure when you adjust your stand.5. STYLUS (PEN) HOLDER. This is clearly well thought out design. Since Surface 3 (or Surface 3 Type Cover) do not have pen holder, this is a great option for those who carry the pen.6. KEYBOARD BUNGEE. You will notice an elastic band on the top right corner of the case, that is for your Type Cover when closed to hold the tablet and keyboard together without getting loose. BUT after 2 days later, it broke. The end of band is not solidly connected to the plastic tab. The elastic band itself is strong, but the end that is connected to the tab (that you can pull) is weak.7. WEIGHT & THICKNESS. The case does add some weight to the Surface 3. You can definitely feel the heaviness and the thickness. If this matters to you a lot, then you might want to consider lighter case or just be very careful with your S3 without the case. Surface 3 without the case is still very durable compare to other netbooks or ultrabooks.All in all this is a great case for your Surface 3. Well designed with maximum protection for your Surface 3. I love this case! Highly highly recommended!

This is a premium case for your Lumia 635. I have cheaper cases (made of TPU), and they are decent. But this case definitely adds more protection and premium feeling.1. Very Sturdy. D3O compound is a shock absorbing material that is unparalleled. Much stronger than TPUs alone. This case will protect your phone very, very well.2. All buttons and ports are accessible. Buttons are covered, so they might be hard to press for some, but I prefer the hard press - because I do not want my phone to accidentally turned on in my pocket - which happened occasionally with TPU cases.3. If you drop the phone, the back-cover (shell) will pop out with the case. This happened with other cases. HINT. Use double sided Scotch tape inside the shell to hold the phone (make sure you do not place the tape on the battery, speaker, or a sensor). Since the tape, the back shell does not pop out when dropped.4. The case is slightly raised above the screen (but not too much), so you can put the phone - face down. But it protects minimally. If you want to protect the screen more, then you might want to consider the other cases (ie, wallet type of case).All in all, I am very pleased with this case. Sure it is more expensive than those TPU cases, but it is better case. Highly recommended!

I hurt my lower back (L4 and L5) - disc disease and lumbar strain. My job as a custodian requires a lot of bending, and I have much wear and tear in my disc (according to the doctor who took a X-Ray). When I went back to work after 2 weeks of rest, inversion table, acupuncture, and massage therapy, still my back was not 100%. Walking was slow and painful. Then I got this Spenco insoles for my work shoes and wow, they are a life saver! My lower back pain was greatly reduced, and my hip joint pains were almost gone! I couldn't believe simple insoles can make that much of difference!If you have a lower back pain, and your job requires much standing, bending, and walking, you should give this insoles a try. It may work for you. Highly recommended!

My eeePC 1000HA has been a great little netbook for my work. I have invested: Windows 7 Home Premium (retail), SSD (128GB), and 2GB RAM on it. And it has been an excellent portable netbook. Then I dropped it on a concrete, and the screen though not shatter3ed, the display showed vertical lines - so I knew it was broken.And I found this replacement screen for less than $45.00 (including S&H). The screen was perfect, it fits perfectly and had no dead pixels! It was matte screen like the original. BUT note that this company may send you a glossy screen if the matte screen is not available. So make sure you contact your seller for your preference.You can easily replace the screen. Just google "How to replace asus eeepc 1000HA screen" - you will find various youtube video instructions. Choose the one that you like. It took about 15 minutes to replace the screen.Happy with the result and highly recommended!

I love this Study Bible almost in every way, but the print quality is less than average. If you are considering this Study Bible, most likely because you are familiar with R.C. Sproul and/or Reformed Theology. I have several Study Bibles (ESV Study Bible, The Reformation Heritage KJV Study Bible, and MacArthur Study Bible), so I can compare them side by side.PROS:1. ATTRACTIVE BINDING & SLIP CASE. [a] It is Smyth-sewn binding (pages are stitched and not glued to the spine). This is rare these days. For the record, both ESVSB and RHKJVSB are also Smyth-sewn. [b] The slip case is strong and appealing. [c] The "Welcome to the Reformation Study Bible" booklet is a great bonus that explains how the Study Bible came about with nice quotes from Reformers of the past. Do not lose this - you  will need it to register to use its web resources - you will be able to download FREE ebooks (epub or mobi), such as: Everyone's A Theologian (by RC Sproul), In Christ Alone (by Sinclair Ferguson), and The Daring Mission of William Tyndale (by Steven Lawson). And other resources include: 6 month DIGITAL Table Talk access. NOTE: registration number is CASE Sensitive.2. CONTENT. [a] it is thoroughly revised and updated from previous Reformation Study Bible (aka New Geneva Study Bible). It has "1.1 million words of verse-by-verse and topical explanations." Much more (40% more) study notes than the previous edition. [b] Thoroughly Reformed study notes. This study Bible consistently interprets the Bible in historically Reformed perspective, being faithful to Reformers' views. ESVSB & MSB are Reformed in Soteriology (doctrine of salvation), but not necessarily in Eschatology or baptism. [c] It also includes Reformed Confessions: Heidelberg, Belgic, Dort, Westminster, and London Baptist, etc. This is helpful collection of historical Reformed confessions and catechisms. [d] The extensiveness of the notes (total 2534 pages) fall into somewhere between ESVSB (total 2750 pages) and RHKJVSB (total 2217 pages). Indeed, I do find ESVSB notes more comprehensive than RSB notes but not by much.3. MAPS. It comes with colored maps at the back, and B&W maps in the study notes. The colored maps are welcomed addition (since it was absent from previous edition). But the smaller B&W maps in the notes are challenging to read. Some may find them too small.4. THREE-COLUMN STUDY NOTES. This is actually an amazing design. I find 3-column study notes easier to read than 2-column study notes.CONS:1. There is ONLY ONE major issue with this Study Bible. The print quality is not in par with ESVSB or RHKJVSB. The fonts are really light and faint compared to other Study Bibles. Both ESVSB & RHKJVSB are still legible because the prints are relatively clear and dark.2. So due to its faint print quality, I cannot read it too long, sadly. So if you wear glasses (or reading glasses), you might struggle to read at some point. I am actually looking forward to read it in computer, if it makes available in Kindle edition or online edition.All in all, this is a great study Bible despite the poor print quality. However, it will not nullify its excellent content! Highly Recommended!

My wife and I are Windows Phone users (Lumia 635, Lumia 925, and HTC 8X). And when I got BLU (Bold Like Us) Vivo Air, my wife wanted to try it out because it was light and thin. After trying it out for a month, she decided to keep on using it much to my dismay. BUT to be fair (even from a Windows Phone user), this Vivo Air is an excellent mid-entry Android phone.PROS:1. THIN & LIGHT. This is one of the best features for this product. It only weighs .21 lbs (97 grams) and 1/8 inches (5.1 mm). This is very unusual for this price range. This is a welcome feature for those who do not want to pay premium price for it.2. EXCELLENT BUILD QUALITY. Usually, when it is this thin and light, the toughness of it is often compromised. But not with Vivo Air. It is built from magnesium alloy frame and has Gorilla glass 3 on the front and back. So this is a one tough hardware. It will withstand daily abuses.3. DISPLAY. It features 4.8-inch 720p Super AMOLED, and it looks better than Lumia 925 screen. My wife prefers it over L925 screen. While not a high end display, it is clearly better than the most at this price range. It displays clear, rich, and sharp images and texts.4. CAMERA. Camera while not the high end, it certainly is not bad at all. It takes decent pictures both inside and outside. Since it comes with front facing (5mp  great for selfies) and back camera with flash (8mp  average for this price range), you will not miss any important shots with friends and family.5. POWER. It comes with Octa-core (8 Core) CPU by MediaTek (up and coming Taiwanese company that is popular in Asia) is plenty strong for daily use. The MediaTek is the first company to innovate True Octacore CPU that processes 8 cores concurrently unlike other octa core (that uses 4 cores at a time). So even though it only comes with 1 GB RAM, your multitasking will be smooth overall. It is faster than Lumia 925.6. ACCESSORIES. The box comes with all that you need. It includes TPU case  that fits Vivo Air perfectly, 1 screen protector (since it comes with only 1, make sure you do not make mistake when you put it on), a headset (a decent quality) and a charger. I love the case, because it also covers the ports when not in use.CONS:1. No micro SD CARD slot. So you are stuck with 16GB internal storage. So if you need more than 16GB storage, then you need to look elsewhere.2. 1GB RAM. While for most users 1GB with Octacore will be enough, it will not be for power users. Especially if you use a lot of apps.3. Android quirkiness. Android OS, even with the higher end, you often see stuttering or lag, but this is not a hardware fault  so you cannot blame BLU. But Android is getting better and better with each release. Vivo Air comes with Kit Kat, but the company promised that there will be an update (Lollipop) for Vivo Air soon.My wife loves it over Lumia 925  despite some minor problems. Indeed, it is a handsome smartphone. If you are already using Android, but looking for something that is thin and light yet powerful but inexpensive, then BLU Vivo Air might be what you are looking for. Highly, highly recommended!

I like this product in every way, except for one area (that's why I gave 4 stars). Let me be brief:PROS:1. The quality of the product is excellent. I cannot find any particular fault in it. From the board to the ball, they are made from superior materials. The backboard is shatter proof, the steel rim is strong and thick for the size, and the ball is tight and heavy (when inflated). In short, it is not cheap.2. It easily hangs on the door as well on the wall (presumably on the wall studs or on the wooden panel, needs to be screwed in).3. My son (11 years old) loves it! If your kids are into basketball, this will definitely bring joy to your kids.CONS.1. Now, if you live in an apartment (2nd floor and above), be warned that tenant below you, will complain. The ball is very heavy (made from dense rubber - just like the regular basketball, except it is only 10" in diameter), therefore when your kid bounce the ball on the floor, you will hear loud pounding. I own a house, and I don't even like the sound. So I replaced the ball with same sized Nerf basketball. But this will diminish the fun factor for kids.2. Because of above issue, it is best suited for basement or outside. Since every home/apartment is different, you must adjust accordingly.All in all, this is a great product, but if you like to be quiet in the house, you may want to replace the ball with Nerf basketball. Kids will still enjoy it immensely. Highly recommended.

This is indeed genuine OEM Nokia back cover for Lumia 635. Only thing that is missing was the black strip pad inside the cover [you can see it in the picture]. Other than that, the cover is genuine and it fits perfectly with my AT&T Lumia 635.1. White shell gives you the premium look. Additionally, if you have a clear (transparent) TPU case, then logo "nokia" is seen in the back.2. Shipping will take few weeks (it is shipped from China). But it is worth the wait.3. It is great to have the option to change the back cover depending on the mood of the day.Overall, very satisfied. Highly recommended!

Personally I use NASB & ESV the most for my studies, but I love NLT for just reading it for pleasure. Because it is easy to understand I have purchased two of them to give my children (9 and 11 years old) to do their QT (Quiet Time). They love the Bible!1. The Bible is attractive (mine is "Black/Onyx Leather Like" edition). The Imitation leather is supple and soft, and it is not hard at all. Easy to hold and nicely designed overall. Pages are silver gilded and not gold. More modern it seems.2. The Font is Great! Because this is a compact edition, the Bible is portable (measures 5" x 7 1/4" x 1 1/4"), but the font is plenty large (8.75) for a compact edition - where you can read the Bible comfortably without squinting.3. Printed in Italy. Quality printing from the first page to the last. The print density is even throughout the Bible (some Bibles have darker prints in one page, and lighter print the next, but I did not notice that in this Bible).4. Not a Reference Bible. If you are looking for a reference Bible, then this edition is not it. It does not have cross reference, or any other study materials. But it does have textual notes at the bottom of the pages, and comes with concordance/dictionary and maps.5. Not Smyth-sewn (stitched) binding. This is the ONLY flaw I find in this Bible. Like many Bibles today, pages are glued to the spine and not stitched. Stitched binding lasts longer and the pages do not fall out. However, it seems that pages are solidly glued to the spine, therefore it should last a long time.Overall, I love the Bible! Great for pleasure reading of the word of God and excellent for kids! Because of the binding, it is almost perfect. Highly recommended!

I have been using Sakura Micron pens for last 28 years for marking my Bibles and taking notes in the margins of the Bible. It does not bleed through the Bible pages (and Bible pages are real thin), and even after 28 years, I can still read clearly what I wrote on the margins of the Bible. The tip of the pen is so thin, it takes some conscious effort to write it without pressuring the tip too hard. For my note taking in the Bible, Micron 005 (.20mm) is the best. Because it is thin, you can write more on the margin, and because it doesn't smudge or bleed through, your notes remain clean without fading. So if you take notes or underline in your Bibles, then this is the best pen out there. Highly highly recommended!

Like many I love my Stream 7.But I do not enjoy typing long emails or docs in onscreen keyboard. It limits the screen area in half, and is difficult to type fast. So I needed something that I can type fast and feels like a real keyboard. After researching little bit, I came to choose Infiland product. This comes with both the case and the Bluetooth keyboard. I was somewhat skeptical in the beginning about the keyboard, but after I received it, I was totally amazed by the quality. Let me be brief:1. THE CASE. the case feels like a leather, but it is not. It feels good in your hands. Protects Stream 7 really well. All the ports, cameras, and buttons are accessible. Power button is slightly covered but does not limit your access. The Velcro that holds the tablet is strong and sturdy. The case is not thin, therefore it provides good protection. The case is single stitched throughout, I was hoping that it was double stitched, but still it is strong. There was no instruction for the case, so you have to play with it a little or look at the product pictures at Amazon. All in all, the case is well made.2. THE KEYBOARD. Wow. I cannot believe they can actually make a keyboard this thin. It is in Chiclet styled keyboard, and you can actually type with two hands easily (I am actually writing this review on it!). The User's Guide provides excellent instruction to charge the keyboard and how to connect the keyboard with your tablet or your smartphone. It fits into the CASE nicely and sturdy. The "ON" and "OFF" button works flawlessly and can easily save your battery when not in use. It connected to my Stream 7 quickly and worked immediately. I was able to work on my Word document with ease. However because it is small, certain key placements you might have to get used to. For example: The "delete" key is next to "P" and apostrophe is "fn"+"<" and the quote (" ") is function + "L" etc. Except for this minor issue, the keyboard is excellent. I can actually do my work!All in all, this is a great product for your Stream 7, especially if you are going to do some work. Highly, highly recommended!

One of the best entry Windows Phones. Period. I own HTC 8X, Lumia 520, 1020, and my wife has 925. Lumia 520 is a great phone, no doubt. But Lumia 635 (I bought it because it was on sale for $39.99) is an incredible value for those who do not want premium phone and do not take selfies. Since there are already many excellent reviews, I just want to add my two cents:1. FAST. While it comes with 512MB RAM, because it is a QUAD core, it is much much faster than Lumia 520. I compared with my HTC 8X and most of the apps open at the same time, and the web experience was actually slightly faster than 8X to my surprise! So you will not be disappointed. L635 comes with LTE speed so it is pretty fast where there is no WiFi available. See [Hint 2] below for enabling LTE.2. BATTERY LIFE. I used it for almost 2 days. email, texts, few calls, and some web browsing lasted me 2 days. But I set the brightness to "LOW" and turned off the apps that work in the background.3. DISPLAY. Certainly at this price range, I do not expect to compete with HTC 8X, but it is decent. Gorilla glass 3 is a huge bonus! I dropped the phone from waste high to the concrete floor in gas station, the back cover popped out, but the screen was not cracked, but the screen protector was scratched. So the Gorilla glass 3 is definitely strong! Also, at least personally, setting the background "light" instead of "dark" helped to improve its display. Perhaps you should try it [settings -> start+theme -> background -> select "light"]4. BRIGHTNESS. Now it does not have "automatic brightness sensor" like Lumia 520, but you can control the brightness of each of "low," "medium," and "high" setting. Now if you see that your "low" setting is too low for you but "medium" is a little too bright, then you can control the brightness of "low" setting to make it brighter. Adjust it accordingly [Settings -> display -> Brightness profile -> click "adjust" -> move the bar at "low level (currently selected)."]5. SOUND. Both calls and music sound are average. They are  clear, but not as clear or rich as 8X or 925. But for a budget phone, this is normal.[HINT: If dropped, the back cover of the phone will pop out even if you have the case put on. To prevent this, use DOUBLE-SIDED scotch tape inside the cover. It will prevent the cover from popping out when dropped. But make sure that you do not cover the sensors or speakers. I put the tape right below the battery and above the speaker].[HINT 2: Enabling LTE. Initially, you will only see 4G speed, but make a call to your friend or a family member from your L635 and speak on the phone for 10 minutes, then within few hours, you will see LTE signal. Additionally, your visual voicemail (vvm) will be enabled - if you have the plan for it].All in all, this is a great entry phone (or backup phone) for those who just want basic smartphone. But if you know Windows Phone, the OS does so much more. It is dependable OS, and at the end of the day, that's what we all want. And I have been using L635 as my daily driver. Highly recommended!

Most of us have all-in-one printers that can copy, fax, and scan. These are indeed useful because they are multifunction printers that can do what most of us need. But these are "jack of all trades, master of none" type of machines. If you need a high quality scanner that is inexpensive then seriously consider Canon LiDE 220 Scanner.1. EASY to SETUP. Just plug and play. Connect the USB cable (provided) to your PC or laptop , Windows 8, & 8.1 will automatically install the driver for you and after the restart, you can start scanning your photos, docs, etc. using Windows scanning tool [go to LiDE220 icon and right click and choose "start scan"]. But If you have Windows 7, you need to install the driver via provided CD or Windows Update. But if you want to use the scanner buttons "PDF," "AUTO SCAN," "COPY," and "SEND" then you need to install the software CD that came with it. Just install the program and run it, then you will be able to use ALL the functions of the scanner.2. NO POWER ADAPTER. The scanner is powered up when you connect it to your PC via USB cable. It does not need AC adapter! This is so simple and frees your desk from cables and clutter. I found this feature extremely useful in moving it from room to room. So unlike mutilfunction printers, you can unplug the scanner and store it away until you need it again. Its lightness and portability makes this product ideal.3. FAST. The scanning speed is fast. I tested it on i5 Core PC (Asus Zenbook, Win 8.1) and on netbook (Asus 1000HA, Win 7), and they were both fast! I was impressed how fast the scanning was.4. QUIET. The scanning was also quieter than the multifunction copiers.5. INCREDIBLE COLORS & DETAIL. My multifunction copiers (I have 2) produce average color reproduction - it is not vivid or even close to original. But this Canon LiDE 220 scans the color almost perfectly. Yes, this is not a high-end scanner, but considering the price, this is a great value for those who want more than all-in-one printer scanner. So if you want to treasure your old pictures with original detail, this scanner will do a great job.6. SEND TO CLOUD. This feature you will need to install the software CD that came with the product. Follow the instruction on how to send to the cloud, such as OneDrive or DropBox. Sending the scanned items to the cloud is a great idea to backup and share with others.All in all, if you are looking to save old pictures, documents, writings, or any other items in their original colors and details, then LiDE 220 is an excellent value and choice for you. Highly, highly recommended!

Fits perfectly with Stream 7. Slightly on the expensive side, but worth it.1. QUALITY PROTECTOR. It is made in the U.S.A and uses superior material. It is Anti-fingerprint (it does not mean it will have no finger prints, it means it is greatly reduced), Anti-bubble (if you follow the instruction, you should not have any bubble on the screen), Anti-bacterial, scratch-resistant, and oil-resistant. You will be pleased with the quality.2. BLUE LIGHT TECHNOLOGY. This is NOT 100% clear screen protector. It has very light colored hue on the screen protector. Personally, I like it, because it seems to diminish glossy effect of the screen. It claims that "the protector features the newest Blue Light technology, which reduces eye strain and fatigue by blocking up to 32% of harmful blue light emitted from device." It looks matte without being a matte screen. Not everyone will prefer it, so choose accordingly.3. INSTRUCTION. It comes with clearly explained instruction to install the protector. HINT: Clean your screen with a cotton pad with rubbing alcohol, it will remove all the oil residues from the screen and the protector will stick so much better.All in all this is a great screen protector for your Stream 7. Highly recommended!

There are many Bluetooth Sports headsets out there and they are not bad. But this Sony product is worthy of serious consideration for those who wear during workouts and even in wet conditions. Now this product is NOT perfect, but it is pretty close.PROS:1. HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS. When you open the box, you immediately notice the quality of its materials. From replaceable ear buds, plastic headsets, to USB cord are durable, solid and have that premium feeling. This is not made of cheap materials.2. MP3 PLAYER + BLUETOOTH PLAYER. This is what makes this product excellent. You do not need your smartphone to listen to your music while you work out all the time. You can either choose to listen to your music via Bluetooth connected devices (smartphones, tablets, etc), or straight from the headset - because MP3 player is built in. It has 4GB storage where you can store decent amount of songs of your choice. [NOTE: to store your songs, EITHER you can use the software that came with it (you need to connect the headset to your PC and open the folder "FOR WINDOWS" and double click "Help Guide Installer" and follow the instruction)] OR just DRAG & DROP your songs into "MUSIC" folder and that's it [NOTE: If you drag & drop a folder of albums that contain your songs, it will only play one song from the album. You need to drag & drop songs (not the folder) to the MUSIC folder].3. MUSIC QUALITY. If you are playing MP3 player, then songs are great! You can really hear the wide range of notes clearly and fully. But if you connect to Bluetooth devices, it is not as rich or fuller compared to MP3. So make sure you store your favorite songs or music into MP3 player as much as possible.4. WATER PROOF. Yes, when you put on swimming earbuds, then you it is water resistant. I took a shower with it, and I did not see any issues. Also I ran in the rain, and it had no issues. But I did not swim with it.5. FIT. The headset fits securely and tightly. I was pleased by its secure placement. BUT the length of wrap around cord (between "L" and "R" earbuds) might be too short for some who have larger heads thus it will be a real tight fit.6. REMOTE. There is a remote control where you can place it on your finger, it works well, but it can hinder other activities. I have short and thick fingers and when I put the remote on and tried to type a keyboard, it hindered my movement. But others I am sure will find it useful. A great option to have.CONS:1. You can only charge the headset via USB port. The headset does not have Micro USB port so you cannot use your typical AC adapter that has micro USB connector to charge your device directly. But you can use with a wall charger that has USB ports.2. Automated information voices and beeps can be loud. The beeps pierced my ears. So be warned.All in all, this is a great choice for who exercise a lot. Having an option of MP3 and Bluetooth is a great choice for those who want flexibility. I love this device despite few flaws. Highly recommended!

A classic and simple watch for all occasions. If you are looking for budget/inexpensive water resistant watch yet stylish, then consider this Casio model.1. It looks much like Swatch Original (but w/o the date function), but not the cost. Swatch costs apprx. $56.00.2. Ticking is very silent, while Swatch is loud.3. Resin band is thinner than I thought.4. Watch is very light.5. Numbers are clear to read, but not at nights - no glow in the dark hands or numbers.All in all, I am happy with the purchase. Again, if you are looking for a watch under $10 that is not a digital watch, this is a great choice! Highly recommended!

Lumia 635 is a great entry/budget phone that performs like a mid-range phone! And to protect this little investment, I wanted to buy a case that is inexpensive and does the job, and this Blue Premium TPU case fits the bill.1. It fits perfectly like a glove. All ports are accessible, and is easy to put on.2. It protects the phone. The buttons are covered, so they are protected from dust or accidental pressure. The screen is protected because the case wraps around the edges where the case is raised about 1/32 inches from the screen. So you can lay the phone flat without screen touching the surface.3. It is attractive case. Blue color is indeed pleasing to the eyes, but the color is not glossy as the picture suggests. It feels solid and durable - not cheap. ALSO Other colored cases are available.[HINT: Even with the case, if dropped, the back cover of the phone will pop out. To prevent this, use DOUBLE-SIDED scotch tape inside the cover. It will prevent the cover from popping out when dropped. But make sure that you do not cover the sensors or speakers. I put the tape right below the battery and above the speaker].All in all, very sturdy and attractive case for your Lumia 635. Highly recommended!

Jesus was described as the One who will not break off "a bruised reed" (Matt. 12:20). It speaks of the tenderness of Christ towards the hurt, the broken, and the weak. His love becomes a healing balm to the afflicted soul.Richard Sibbes (1577-1635), an English Puritan captures so well of Jesus as compassionate healer of the broken soul and the weak. I was profoundly influenced by the book personally and pastorally. Richard Sibbes had a knack of explaining the love of Christ, it moved me to tears - tears of joy and gratitude to know that such Savior cares for me. For example:"Shall our sins discourage us, when he [Christ] appears there for sinners? Are you bruised? Be of good comfort, he calls you. Conceal not your wounds, open all before him and take not Satan's counsel. Go to Christ, although trembling, as the poor woman who said, `If I may but touch his garment' (Matt. 9:21). We shall be healed and have a gracious answer... Never fear to go to God, since we have such Mediator with him, who is not only our friend but our brother and husband" (p. 9). Another example is:"God knows we have nothing of ourselves, therefore in the covenant of grace he requires no more than he gives, but gives what he requires, and accepts what he gives: `If she be not be able to bring a lamb, then shall bring two turtle doves' (Lev. 12:8). What is the gospel itself but a merciful moderation, in which Christ's obedience is esteemed ours, and our sins laid upon him, wherein God, from being a judge, becomes our Father, pardoning our sins and accepting our obedience, though feeble and blemished? We are now brought to heaven under the covenant of grace by a way of love and mercy" (p. 36).And throughout the book, Richard Sibbes digs into deep theological truths of the gospel and plainly applies to the afflicted. Therefore his encouragement to the poor soul is not a fluff or filler, but theological truths stem from the gospel of grace. That is why it is so effective.It may be a slow reading (it is), but it is immensely rewarding to your soul. Read it slowly, digest it, and you will see Christ in a different light - you will see Him as sweet and precious Savior for your lonely and troubled soul. Highly recommended.

Considering the price, this is basic external CD/DVD drive that works. For some who use external drive extensively, might want to consider higher end product that will endure wear & tear of the drive. Others who use infrequently (once in a while), this LG might fit the bill.1. It is decently built. Made of plastic, while somewhat sturdy, still it will break if dropped. So handle with care.2. It works with Windows 7, 8, & 8.1 out of the box. You do not need to install separate driver. Windows (7&8) will recognize the drive. So you can read & write CDs and DVDs. Read & Write speed is average among this price range.3. You can play DVD as well, but EITHER you can install the software (CD) that came with it OR download & use VLC media player. Windows Media Player will not play DVD.4. You do not need 2nd USB cord to power the drive. A provided single USB cable will connect and power up LG drive through your notebooks. It also works well with netbooks. I connected the LG drive to ASUS eee PC 1000HA (2gb RAM, Win 7, 128gb SSD), and it worked great!5. Works with Linux as well. I dual-boot eee PC 1000HA with Win 7 and Xubuntu 14.10, and Xubuntu 14.10 recognized the drive and played the DVD in VLC media player.6. You can also connect the drive to your TV - provided that your TV has USB port. So you can play your DVD and watch it on your TV.7. You can read/write M-Discs. This is a great advantage of this drive. M-Discs can store your files (docs, pictures, & movies) for 1000 years. Yes. 1000 years.8. The box comes with DVD drive, manual, 1 USB cable, and Software CD (to play DVDs, install drivers, etc). But I did not need the software CD for my purpose. But it is good to have it handy, just in case.All in all, this is a simple CD/DVD drive that will work well with your notebooks and netbooks, including Linux OS. Again, if you are going to use the drive extensively (every day), then you might want to purchase something more sturdy, but if you are going to use it occasionally, then this LG model is a great product for you. Highly recommended.

My journey of finding that perfect coffee taste: It all began, from instant coffee to drip coffee to percolator, and finally French Coffee Press. I've heard it before, and I was curious about it - since many rave about its coffee taste. So when I tried French Coffee Press with this product, I was blown away! Wow... the coffee tastes so pure, so delightful! I am not an expert on coffee, but I can taste the difference between percolated coffee vs. French Coffee Press. So if you already know the pure delight of French press coffee, then you might want to consider Francois et Mimi Stainless Steel Double Wall French Coffee Press (34oz).1. BEAUTIFUL. This stainless steel is simple, elegant, and beautiful. It is a timeless beauty of stainless with classical design. Very attractive.2. SIMPLE to USE. Like many other French Coffee Press, this is very simple to use. I love the kettle like design with generous handle for anyone to use.3. DOUBLE WALL. This is to retain the heat of the coffee longer. Certainly this is better than the ones made of glass. My coffee was hot and satisfying even after 20 minutes.4. STUDY. The whole product is strong and sturdy, including the press.Since it is made of stainless steel, it wouldn't easily break as the glass ones. But since it is a metal, it may dent.5. PRICE. At this price (as of today $49.95), this is a great opportunity to experience French Press Coffee without risking much.All in all, if you are looking for an excellent French Coffee Press with cheap price and not glass made, then this is a great buy! Highly recommended!

This is a great set of blasters where 2 kids can play! Usually, it is not fun to play by oneself with this kind of blasters, but when you have 2 blasters - that's a different story. My kids (9 and 11 years old) run around and try to shoot each other with the blaster!1. FUN for two. The set comes with 2 blasters so 2 persons can play with each other or with the provided target (and yes, the darts do stick). The darts travel up to approx. 70 feet, but usually less, but still far enough to challenge your shooting or "blasting" skills. Another way to enhance the fun is to set up targets (small toys, matchbox or hotwheels cars) on the table and try to hit them from a distance.2. STURDY. The plastic is strong and not flimsy. It could withstand accidental drops. The shield, however, can be broken due to simple connection to the blaster. But my kids seldom uses the shield, so it is not a big deal.All in all, this is a great set for those who have 2 kids (or friends). Highly recommended!

This is a great toy blaster! My kids love it!1. FUN. This blaster is fun because the kids love when it shoots far (about 70 feet). Because it does not need to be reloaded each time (you could load all 8 darts at once). You could use it to knock off targets of your choice from the table or you could use the provided target board. Kids are creative, so they can make many kinds of fun games with this blaster.2. STURDY. The plastic is very strong and not flimsy. So it should withstand drops and falls.Yes, if you are looking for a decent blaster for your kids, this is a great choice! Recommended!

Nowadays Solid States Drives (SSD) are becoming more affordable and that means performance boost for your old laptops or PCs. If you are not ready to purchase new computers, but want to have increased performance, then SSD is the best way to go. I have Lenovo G560 laptop (4 year old basic notebook without power CPU or bells & whistles), but I am not ready to buy a new one. Well by upgrading my HD to OCZ Vector 150 Series SSD tremendously improved my G560.For detailed benchmark for this SSD, you can easily find more professional reviews online, but my purpose is to show that OCZ SSD with Windows 8.1 (b/c it is better with SSDs) have given new lease on the notebook.1. BOOT UP and SHUT DOWN time are almost instant. For G560, it was less than 5 seconds boot up, and less than 4 seconds shut down.2. APPLICATIONS open up much more quickly than previous HD. MS Word, Excel opens up less than a second. Other applications that I use for my work varies depending on the program, but still faster than HD.3. PICTURES & VIDEOS open up faster and transfer to another media (USB stick or SD card) is much faster than HD.4. WEB SURFING has also improved. Basically everything has been faster with this OCZ Vector 150 SSD.5. PRICE. OCZ Vector 150 series is cheaper than other brands. I was surprised by its price and quality. Having been using this about two months, and not a single glitch.All in all, OCZ Vector 150 series SSD is inexpensive, high quality, and high performance SSD that will give new life to your old notebooks and PCs. I love it! Highly highly recommended!

First Aid kit is essential preparation for any family. Especially if you have children with activities (soccer, basketball, baseball, etc), then you want to have decent First Aid kit with you (either at home or in the car). Since we do not know when the emergencies would happen, being prepared is KEY to unfortunate situations. As a certified CPR, AED, & First Aid, school district employee, I can recommend Physicians CARE First Aid kit wholeheartedly.1. THE CONTAINER. the plastic box is strong and sturdy and can withstand minor abuses. It could be tossed around yet will not break apart. The clips that hold the container are strong and will not easily pop open. It could be hung on the wall if you choose to.2. INSIDE THE CONTAINER. It has enough to help in most situations. It comes with titanium scissor, sterile pads, boxes of Nitrile gloves, 1"x3" Bandage, First Aid tape, Burn Cream, Antibiotic Ointment, Antiseptic Wipes, Triangular Bandages, and CPR, AED, & Basic First Aid Pocket Reference Guide. The Pocket Guide will definitely help even if you do not know what to do. Following the instruction calmly will help you to help others in need.3. PRICE. The price is reasonable. But the first aid kit cannot be measured by dollar amount, but its usefulness. And I think that it will give you the peace of mind.4. FOR HOME and CAR. Our family has two first aid kits. One for home and one for our car. Since our kids play soccer, baseball, and basketball regularly, it is essential that we one for the car. If anything happens, we know we are prepared to alleviate the situation.All in all, this is a great First Aid kit. You will certainly be at ease knowing that you are prepared. Highly Recommended.

My wife and I were looking for notebooks for our kids (9 and 11 yrs old). DELL had a sale for $200.00 for this model, and we could not pass up the opportunity. All in all, this is an excellent laptop for kids or very basic laptop for a family.PROS:1. CHIP: Intel Celeron (dual core). This is a latest Celeron chip (N2830, Bay Trail - M) you will have. Being a dual core can handle most of the demands easily. Because it is a Bay Trail chip, it is quiet and not heavy on your resources. It is so quiet, you hardly hear the fan at all. So for your Web browsing, emails, YouTube viewing, MS Office, some gaming, and every day chores, this is a great basic laptop.2. BUILD. The black matte finish is not fancy but functional. Simple but sturdy. The keyboard has no flex, and comes with chiclet keyboard that is well designed and generously spaced. The screen is bright and resolution is normal for this price range.3. PRICE. Price differs from store to store, but if you get it in right time, you might get it for around $200.00. Even $250 is a good price. To give you a comparison: various Chromebooks are priced in this range but with less functions and memories. Additionally, you CANNOT install any Windows programs (such as, MS Office, etc), so while Chromebooks have their proper place, for those who need basic laptop for general use, this laptop might be a better fit in this price range.4. OS. Windows 8.1 is far, far better than Windows 8.0. If you already have 8.0, then you should update/upgrade it to 8.1. I love using it, and my kids love the tiles. PLUS, I love 8.1's Family Safety feature. I can control how much my kids can be on the computer and what days. Additionally you can also filter what kind of web they are browsing. MS also sends you (the parent) weekly report on the kids use of the computer. Love this feature! Easy to set up and monitor.CONS:1. No optical Drive (DVD/CD). But nowadays, this is not really needed anymore. But for those who need it, you might have to consider other models.2. No Bluetooth. The box says, "Bluetooth" but this is misprint. This model does NOT have Bluetooth.3. Only 2 USB (2.0) ports. I was hoping that it had another USB port.Despite the cons, considering its price, this is an excellent entry laptop for kids and those who just want sturdy, dependable laptop for every day general use. Highly, highly recommended!

This BlueAnt Pump Wireless HD Sportbuds is pure, simple, and solid. No bells and whistles, just an excellent headset that is waterproof while you workout or for leisure use.1. SOLID. The build and quality are solid. It is sturdy and strong. It is not made of cheap plastic, but durable one. You could see and feel the difference as you hold it in your hand.2. HEADSET. The design is simple. The purpose is to hold the headset while you workout, so the design (over the ear) is perfect for that purpose. It also comes with stabilizers so it can add to more customized stability. Buttons are few: power and volumes (+ & -). Those three button are used for Bluetooth connection, playing & listening to music; receiving & answering calls.3. WATERPROOF. Yes, it is sweat proof,and water proof. I ran while raining (rains a lot in Seattle), and it did not affect the sound at all. I worked out sweating, and it did not short out or damage the sound system. But you are not advised to swim with it. This is of course, overkill.4. SOUND. Sound quality is clear, rich and full. Bass sound stands out. You will definitely enjoy listening to your music while working out.5. CONNECTION. The headset connects with any Bluetooth device: smartphones (I have Windows Phone 8, HTC 8X), iPod touch, tablets, etc... Just follow the simple instruction in the manual.Overall, it is an excellent and solid headset for your workout or for pleasure. Highly recommended!

If your home, church, or business needs a great quality LCD Projector yet that will not break your bank, this Epson VS330 is it. Since there are some excellent technical reviews on Amazon, I will just dwell on actual use of it at home.1. BUILD. The plastic casing while light, is not weak. It is sturdy. It will withstand normal bumps on the tables and things. Casing is tight. That is, you will not see loose parts or areas. Nicely put together.2. EASY TO USE. This is my FIRST LCD Projector. I was able to use it within 5 minutes as I hooked it up to my netbook (ASUS 1000HA). All the button are easy to see and clearly labelled. Ports (USB A&B, S-Video, Audio, HDMI) are also clearly labelled. The remote control is also easy to understand. NOTE: Read Quick Start guide, you will be able to use the projector very quickly.3. BRIGHTNESS. Note that this model has "2700 COLOR lumens" and "2700 WHITE lumens." It is the COLOR lumens that will dictate the brightness and the richness of the color images (pictures, movies, presentation). So make sure you compare the "COLOR lumens." Some other LCD projectors do not mention color lumens but only WHITE Lumens to attract consumers. I've seen a comparable priced LCD projector which has 2700 white lumens, but lower color lumens (the model doesn't even mention it), and the colors look faded and dull. My family saw how bright and rich the colors were! We felt like we were in a mini-movie theater! We saw various movie clips (youtube) and family movies (phone, digital camera, etc).4. NOTEBOOKS, NETBOOKS, and SMARTPHONES. Yes. You can connect your laptops AND even netbooks that has computer port (monitor port). Also, you can project your smartphone images as well. But this depends on your smartphone. Some smartphones can directly project via USB-A connection, but others need to connect the phone to the laptop first.5. PORTABILITY. This is a small and light projector compared to others. It weighs about 5 lbs and measures 11" x 5" x 8 3/4". But if you are going to carry it, I recommend that you purchase a decent carrying case for it. Or you can use the box that came with it.Overall, I am very impressed with it. For entry or general purpose (for fun and work), you CANNOT beat this Epson model. Highly, highly recommended!

Let me brief. The Chummie Alarm does work. The alarm is loud and vibration is strong enough to wake you.1. The gadget is small enough to place it on boy's pajamas. It has a removable clip. The clip is strong enough to stay on the cloth.2. The sensor is placed outside of the underwear. And when the underwear is wet (a very small wetness) will trigger the alarm.3. Alarm, vibration, and flashing blue lights go ON to wake up the boy so that he may learn to go to the bathroom. [1] Yes, the alarm is loud. [2] The vibration has enough movement to wake the child, and [3] flashing blue light creates the urgency.4. So, yes, the gadget works well. HOWEVER...Consider:1. The alarm, vibration, and flashing lights can surprise the boy - if he is not used to it. It is kind of mild shock treatment of sort. Because it will suddenly wake the boy.2. Not all boys like to wear it - because to them, it is uncomfortable. Do not force them wear it. Rather try to convince them to try it for few days.3. Perhaps, being scared of using it, the boy might actually stop wet the bed at night.Yes, it works well. But some convincing might be necessary. Recommended!

This Zing Air Zano is an inexpensive toy for kids who like archery. Arrows fly strong as advertised. Initially I was surprised how far the arrows went! So its power adds to the fun factor. My kids loved playing with it. In brief:1. It is decently made. The quality is above average.2. If the suction cup of the arrow - does not stick to the target, try to moist the suction cup slightly. It will easily stick to the flat/smooth surface (windows, etc).3. The target is made from a paper (a slightly thick) - and you need to tape it to the wall to hold it there.4. Only 2 arrows. Wished it had more, but you can purchase additional arrows.All in all, it is very good toy. Recommended.

Wow, what a beautiful craftsmanship! This Bluetooth stereo speaker is pleasing to the ears AND eyes. I LOVE this wooden (custom milled bamboo) enclosure for the speakers! Let me be brief:1. SOUND. I was really surprised by its sound quality: strong bass is booming and at the same time, captures high note well. The sound is clear and carries in the room. I must admit that it does sound like Bose Wave Audio System.2. AESTHETIC. It simply is beautiful. The speaker is pleasing to the eyes. Because it is made of milled bamboo, you can see and feel it as well. The black speakers are unassuming and highlights the wooden enclosure well. It is also wrapped with gray fabric (composed of reclaimed hemp, organic cotton, and recycled plastic bottles) that is strong and functional.3. SIMPLE. It is easy to connect with your Bluetooth electronics (iPod, smartphones, etc). You can also connect with non-Bluetooth items that audio jack. You can connect with your laptop and use the speaker the same way. 3.5 mm Stereo Mini cable comes with the speaker so you can use it right away. There are 4 buttons on the top, where clearly marked for easy access.4. PORTABILITY. Although I would not use this as a portable speaker, it is just that. The speaker is rechargeable so you can use it anywhere without the AC power cable. I choose to use it as a stationary speaker on my desk.5. POSSIBLE MINOR ISSUE. If the sound gets dropped, or cuts away during the play, try this: Lower the volume from the speaker and increase the volume from the source (smartphone, laptop), you will note that it will no longer drop the sound. Try few times to get right balance where no drops occur.All in all, I am very, very satisfied. If the price is not an issue, then this is an excellent speaker for all occasions! Highly, highly recommended.

Lumia 520 is an excellent entry smartphone as many have experienced. Although 520 is inexpensive nowadays (currently $54.99 in Amazon), a decent case might be necessary for some. If you are looking for light, durable, and flexible case, then this Fosmon DURA-FRO series is it.1. PRICE. It is less than $5.00 (includes shipping). It is definitely affordable.2. QUALITY. Although it is inexpensive, it is not cheaply made. TPU is well known for its durability and will protect your phone against drop on the floor and scratches. It has a nice matte finish on the back where it is not slippery.The cover is 1/16" raised around the edges of the phone to protect the screen of the phone. That is, if the phone drops face down, the screen will not hit the ground.3. FIT. It fits like a glove. A perfect fit for your 520. All entries are accessible without any hindrances. All buttons are covered, they are easy to press.All in all, this is a great case. Highly recommended for your 520!

I already own HTC 8X, my wife has Lumia 925. I got Lumia 520 (ATT) as a backup phone (just in case, if we lose or break our phones), since it was on sale for $59.00 with FREE Incipio case (+ FREE shipping). I didn't expect too much, but I knew that Windows Phone OS will be smooth on the low spec phones. But when I received it and used it for few days, I can only say, "WOW." This is the best entry smartphone - including all entry level Android phones. Now make no mistake, this is not a high end phone. But this is very capable entry phone for all your needs. You can read excellent online reviews for Lumia 520, so let me just mention few excellent qualities of Lumia 520:1. PRICE. As of now, Amazon sellls it for $54.99. That is incredibly cheap. Just to give you a comparison, Sansa Clip+ MP3 Player (8GB) is $49.00 in Amazon. But Lumia 520 does so much more than playing your music. It has Nokia maps, drive+, etc, you can browse the web, email, set calendar for your appointments. You can take pictures, you can call & text. You can read ebooks, you can do MS Office (preloaded), and so much more. So for $54.99, you are getting a mini-computer at your disposal. At this price, it is bargain.2. WINDOWS PHONE OS. If you are used to WP OS, then you already know how smooth, simple, and useful it is. But if you are thinking about WP, then Lumia 520 is an excellent choice (if you don't mind its low spec) for you to try it out since it is so cheap, you will still experience buttery smooth OS that makes your life organized and entertained. Lumia 520 is preloaded with WP 8, but you can easily upgrade it to WP 8.1 and Lumia Black. Sure it is not as fast as high end WP (ie, Lumia 925, HTC 8X, etc), but it is decent. It is smooth. NOTE: If you want to sync with Windows Phone with your contact list, email, calendar, etc.., it is BEST to use Windows Live Mail (FREE email client from Microsoft). It will always sync with your desktop/laptop with your phone.3. FUNCTIONALITY: call is clear, speaker is loud enough, screen (IPS LCD) is bright & clear, but it is finger print magnet (but this is greatly reduced by putting on screen protector - Illumishield product). Memory can be expanded by Micro SD card - where you can store: maps, music, pictures, apps, and documents. Bluetooth (version 4.0) works flawlessly. The screen is responsive even with the gloves on. No front facing camera, but I don't do selfie - so it doesn't matter.In sum, this is the best entry smartphone you can buy. You cannot beat this price with this much quality. I love this phone. you might too. Give it a chance.

When you have kids and all their after school activities, you need something to remind you of your daily tasks and chores. Sure, smartphone helps. But sometimes, you need good old marker/cork board to remind you the old fashioned way! Even my daughter (9 yrs old) loves this! She puts the board in her room, and writes down what she needs to do. It is a great reminder for her.1. MATERIAL. While not the best or premium kind, it is made of decent quality. Edges are not made of metal or aluminum, but made of a plastic - which is nice. The cork and marker board is average quality.2. USEFULNESS. Definitely useful. You can out on the cork board whatever you want to pin: pictures, letters, to do lists, etc... On the marker board, you can write your list of chores or reminders for your family etc.3. PLACEMENT. Although it comes with self-adhesive tape for the wall, you might want to hang the board.All in all, it is inexpensive and decent quality board for whole family. Recommended!

DISCLAIMER: Products like this depends on your health, condition, and physical make up. So your results may vary. For general context for this review: I am 47 years old male, non-smoker, non-drinker, and in decent shape (not an athlete kind).1. IT WORKS. Wow. I took 1 scoop [a scoop is really small amount compared to other pre-workout drinks], and during my workout (cardio & some strengthening), it caused me to sweat like no other! It was intense workout. I did more with this pre-workout drink than not. It seems to give you a boost, intensity, and burst of strength during the workout.2. IT MAKES You JITTERY. I realize that many products like this will make you jittery due to caffeine or high dose of stimulants in the product. Although I do not prefer jitters, I am used to it. If you are set against feeling jittery, then consider others products.3. IT MIXES EASY with water. I just put one scoop in a plastic bottle with 6 oz of water and shake it for 10 seconds and drink it. No chemical residue at the end. Among many pre-workout drinks I tried, this one mixes the best and easiest.4. IT TASTES DECENT. Fruit punch taste was better and cleaner than I expected. It decent because there was no chemical residue at the end.5. IT CAN be USED as ENERGY DRINK. If you need a quick energy for the task at hand, you could also use this as an energy drink (more powerful than Red Bull). I work as a custodian, and sometimes when I need extra energy, I take this drink and it gives me some pep to plow through my work. Love this!All in all, if you are in a decent shape, and needs something extra for your workout (or for some added energy), consider this product. You may be surprised by its effectiveness. Recommended!

Just like other SKLZ equipment, this baseball tee is great! My kids (11 and 9 years old) love to use it for batting practices. They use regular baseball, tennis ball, and wiffle ball not just to practice but also to have fun! My son (11) just joined his first baseball team and he has been using it to practice his swing. And he likes it using it.1. STURDY. The material used here are sturdy and durable. The plastics are not cheap, but strong and thick. The base is heavy so that it can withstand the swing, but not heavy enough to be not portable. This is a quality tee.2. EASY to Assemble & Disassemble. It is adjustable for any height. My kids were able to adjust by themselves. It is also very quick and easy to assemble & disassemble. The tee itself can be attached to the base flat - making easy to carry and store.3. FUN factor. My kids love it and I too enjoy using it with my kids to have fun with them!All in all, I highly recommend this tee if you are thinking about getting one!

This is basically an OK health tracker. For the money, I thought it could do more and simpler. Don't get me wrong, this is made with quality. The strap, the digital display, and the materials used are pretty good. But the functionality is somewhat limited in itself but need a computer (and smartphone) to use all the functionality. If you are simply looking to track: number of steps you took, heart rate, calories burned, then it is better to purchase inexpensive one.1. Without the computer, this is simply a bulky watch with basic heart monitor. The Basis Tracker will display calories burned, heart rate, and steps you took.2. BUT if you use your computer/smartphone (app needs to be downloaded), then it can actually give you in-depth analysis of your heart rate and calories burned throughout the day and also through the weeks. So you can have big picture of how your heart is expended. So it can generally detect your stress level. How accurate this reading is, I am not sure.3. You need to recharge this watch with computer on. The fully charged watch can be used for a full day.4. NOTE: Intel purchased Basis company, and this model is discontinued.Since it is expensive and uncertain future with Intel purchase. SKIP this particular health tracker.

This particular Large Print Compact Bible (TruTone, Mahogany) is one of the better compact Bibles I have seen. Sure you could pay more to purchase Pitt Minion series, but fonts are smaller. But this edition is affordable and has font size of 8. Let me be brief.1. TRANSLATION. ESV has been very popular for several years, and you can find some excellent reviews online. But this review is not about the translation. I use both ESV & NASB, and I love them both.2. COVER. This TruTone is supple. Previous editions (ie. coffee) was not supple or as flexible. This Mahogany is really soft and supple. I love the feel of it. Design is simple and classical. Love its color - conservative and unassuming.3. FORMAT. The pages do not have cross-references, just textual notes on the bottom. This is NOT a reference Bible. It is a compact Bible that meant portability with readability. The text is clear and is red letter edition.The font size is 8 and is plenty big for compact Bible. It is in paragraph format like so many other editions of the Bible. It includes the concordance in the back, but NO MAP - this is only drawback, if I were to mention.4. BINDING. This is Smyth-sewn binding (stitched, and not glued to the spine). I LOVE THIS! Almost all of the Bibles are glued to the spine in this price range. But Crossway seems to be committed to produce affordable yet quality binding Bibles. Because it is stitched, it is stronger and lay flat on the table.All in all, I love this edition. If you are looking for something that is inexpensive, compact yet readable, and attractive, then get this Bible. Highly, highly recommended!

DISCLAIMER: Each person's reaction to this kind of drinks is different. Your result may not be same as mine. For the context of this review, I am an Asian male, 47 years old, non-smoker & non-drinker, and is in decent shape.I've tried many "pre-workout" drink mixes such as: Jack 3D, BSN Hyper etc... These are pretty much similar products, but everyone reacts little differently because our bodies are not the same. Hyper gave me a lot of jitters. Jack 3D was better with a minor jitters. As for Labrada Super Charge!, I've found it to be a good pre-workout mix.1. NO SIDE EFFECTS. At least for me, I did not have any jitters (but this does not mean you wouldn't). My body felt fine after drinking it (1 scoop) . I did not have any headaches, nausea, or any other mild side effects with Labrada. So this was good for me.2. CAFFEINE & TAURINE. Yes, this does have caffeine (labeled as "methylxanthines"), and each scoop is equal to almost 3 cups of coffee, so that is a lot of caffeine so if you are trying to cut down on a caffeine, this may not be a best product. TAURINE is same ingredient you'll find in a can of RED BULL, it supposedly gives you alertness (1 scoop has 1000 mg, same amount as a can of Red Bull). But if you are wary of Taurine, then you might want to skip this.3. PERFORMANCE. I did notice in my stamina when I work out. I do some basic free weights and cardio (Insanity, Focus 25), and preworkout drink helped me to get through the workout with minimum exhaustion and less frequent pauses. So yes, it does seem to work.4. FAST Recovery. Nice bonus of including BCAA 2:1:1 helps you to recover faster after workout. But of course, if you drink protein mix after your workout, it would already have BCAA.5. TASTE. Not the best, but not the worst. Hint: mix really, really well. Expect bitter after taste if you consume little undissolved white powders at the end.All in all, if you really NEED to get "pre-workout" drink mix, then consider Labrada Super Charge, for me, it was pretty good without any strange side effects, so I would recommend the product. BUT if you are cautious about the amount of caffeine and taurine, then skip pre-workout drink mix of any kind, and eat a banana before your workout.

There are many exercise balls out there, and it is difficult to determines which one is better. Like always, a consumer must research and even visit sporting good stores to see and feel these equipments. If you are considering purchase an exercise ball, keep SKLZ in the list.1. SKLZ generally makes a quality sporting/athletic equipments: baseball net, soccer net, baseball tee, etc. In my experience SKLZ products have been excellent in durability and quality. So the brand name here means trust.2. This Golf Trainer Ball is not only for those who play golf. This is basically an exercise ball. I have seen this same kind of balls in athletic clubs in NYC and everyone was using it and not just golfers.3. The rubber material is soft, and not as thin as other exercise balls. It feels gentle on your hand and your body. It has non-slippery feel to it - thus promoting stability in your movement on the ball.4. The diagram on the ball helps, but not the best. I would recommend that you use youtube to see how to use exercise balls. The diagram is merely a pointer, not an extensive "how-to"s.5. The pump is something getting use to. It is small (portable kind). It will take some length to inflate the ball to the point where you can use it. Some say you can inflate the ball between 10-25 minutes depending on your stamina. If you are an older person (55+ years old), you may want some others to inflate the ball for you. If you have automatic air pump, then it is easier of course.6. HINT: After inflating the ball (make sure you follow the instruction), make sure to plug the hole well. Press all the way in, so that no air will escape.7. After using it for a while, I see the benefit of it. It does help your body to stretch better and work on your core and other parts of your body.Highly recommended.

SKLZ always produced quality sports equipment. I had their soccer net for my kids in the past and We loved it! It was easy to set up and durable. Likewise, this baseball combo net system is also quality product. Let me be brief:1. PORTABLE. the nets can be disassembled into parts so that you can put it in a durable bag that came with it. It can be easily placed in your car or SUV trunk, and it does not take much space. And you can always leave it in the car for next practice.2. DURABLE. The frames and the nets are light but very durable. Meshed nets are laced with quality material, you could feel it once you touch it. As mentioned, earlier, SKLZ makes quality products, and this is no exception.3. EASY TO SETUP. Both assemble & disassemble take less than 5-7 minutes depending on your familiarity with it.4. FUN FACTOR. My son (11 years old), just started his first baseball season. And he loves this! He enjoys practicing it with SKLZ because he does not need to chase after the ball after hitting it. He can practice by himself. He can practice pitching and hitting without running after the ball. This greatly increases fun factor.5. GET A BASEBALL TEE. To complete the set, you might want to consider getting the baseball tee.All in all, I am very satisfied with the product. SKLZ has yet to let me down. Their product is quality and affordable. Highly recommended!

I have a couple of inexpensive Bluetooth speakers for my smartphone and tablets, but their sound qualities are lacking. They were only little bit better than the smartphone speaker. But if you want something that is better than cheap Bluetooth speakers, you might want to seriously consider Belkin's FUSIVE Bluetooth speaker.1. SLIM & LIGHT. Yes, it is slim.
