These really do cut down the drying time and does what dryer sheets I use to get at the store without the harsh chemicals. I was iffy at first expecting but these dryer balls prevent statics and also there is no odd smell to our clothes. I also kept an eye on my boys eczema and they have not had a breakout after switching to these dryer balls. I also love that these are organic and safe for our environment. I am telling everyone I know about these! Thank you for such an awesome product!

I really love this Z-Ray inflatable paddleboard. We have been doing to the river to bbq and also float downstream and this paddleboard was amazing. It held my weight and I enjoyed floating on the river laying back catching some rays. It is very easy to inflate and this is so much better than the solid paddleboard, I can just pack everything up and go without having to lug a big board around.

This oil diffuser is just beautiful, it goes great with our oak side table in our living room. The diffuser sprays mists of oil and water but not to the point where it makes the area damp, our whole house gets that warm aroma smell from the oil I add to the diffuser. This diffuser is very quiet so you won't even realize it is on. This is great to give as a gift or for home. I have had friends just complement is diffuser and may have the perfect gifts for them this Christmas. I received this during one of their promotion at a discounted price.

I am always looking for new educational apps for my boys to play with. We all love Super Why and this app lets them interact and be part of the Super Why adventure. My sons both learned a lot from this app, they understand the use of the alphabet and they are learning fast. I highly recommend this to parents looking for those perfect educational apps.

As far as the taste goes this has a pineapple/citrus flavor. I really like that they have used stevia as one of the sweeteners, I'm not crazy about the fructose as I am trying to avoid sugars that spike  an insulin reaction but it is an negligible amount (*I've given the ingredients below).I like to mix this into my unsweetened iced tea, perhaps those that do not like to chug a nutritional supplement  would like it better if they enjoyed it as a beverage as part of a meal or "coffee break" with a snack.As far as seeing the benefits of it, I am 58 years old and while I know there is medical studies that show these nutrients ar VERY beneficial for us as we age, I cannot attest to SEEING results with only a 21 day box, which is also strange that they didn't package it in a 30 day/serving package! I mean really, why only 21 days??  I like it but I don't think I would pay this much to continue with it long term as I cannot afford the price with our budget but if price wasn't an issue I would definitely continue because ingesting this in a drink gives you the very best absorption of these nutrients as all other similar supplements I've seen have magnesium stearate, cellulose other binders and fillers etc that  hinder absorption.Calories 36Total CarbohydratesDietary FiberSugars1.6 g0.2 g0.9 g<1%<1%**ProteinPeptan Hydrolyzed Type-1Collagen Peptides7.2 g8,000 mg14%**Sodium (as sodium hyaluronate) 3 mg <1%Vitamin C (as Ascorbic acid) 180 mg 300%Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) 0.9 mg 53%Folic acid 0.4 mg 100%Biotin 20 mcg 7%Pantothenic acid 25 mg 250%Manganese (as manganese gluconate) 2.4 mg 118%MSM (as Methylsulfonylmethane) 300 mg **Beta-alanine 250 mg **Hyaluronic acid 5 mg **Immortelle (Helichrysum arenarium) flowers dry extract 20 mg *** Percent daily value based on a 2 000 calorie diet.** Daily Value (DV) not established.Other Ingredients: Fructose, powdered lemon juice, natural pineapple flavor, stevia.

I needed this for my ipad Air2, but when the E7 arrived none of the lights came on that indicate charging... maybe this was just a defective batch...Anyways I purchased from Amazon (not a third party seller) so I had no problems initiating a return, the next day Anker contacted me and worked with me to resolve my problem. The replacement battery they sent arrived with 1/2 a charge (there were 2 blue lights steady and 1 blinking) I plugged it into the wall with my ipad Air2 charger and their cable that came with it and by morning it was fully charged. It works exactly as described. I charge my ipad with my Apple cable my ipad came with. Now any company (*especially one that makes these batteries) can have an occasional lemon but it is what they do about it that keeps consumers either coming back or away in droves.....I have NEVER received such great customer service from ANy company for ANYTHING like the way Anker provided me EVER!!!Not only was it prompt and courteous but I didn't even solicit them for help!!I absolutely detest those long drawn out ordeals where you argue with someone forever and then they pass you off to another person and you have to explain all over again and nothing usually is accomplished other than you having wasted hours from your day/life! In hindsight I should have contacted Anker BEFORE initiating the return, perhaps there was a "fix" they could have walked me through. I feel bad for lumping them into the same category as other manufacturers that could care less about customer service.They really are different. from now on I will buy their products with confidence. I've already told my kids that are in college that these are the ones to buy! They are Computer Science majors so any "tech" type info really gets around fast there at their University. Anyways, the replacement battery is working fine as described. I will update if I have any issues down the road, but for now I am good to go!

We recently switched from latex to nitrile  gloves when  treating rescue dogs with contagious skin issues like ringworm and mange. Nothing was worse than having a finger pop through the latex gloves when rubbing medicine into  their contagious lesions. We would have to stop and disinfect our hands and resume , which made it harder on the animals and us!!  The nitrile gloves are superior in every way, they fit better, last lomger and actually are cheaper per 100 as we use less per animal. Well all of a sudden I noticed my supply of the blue Amnex nitrile gloves was diminishing more rapidly than usual and I discovered that my husband and sons were "borrowing them when working on the engines in the cars they were restoring! So when I saw these black ones that were better suited for their needs I gave them to them to use so they would leave mine alone! A bonus is that now when they come in and out of the kitchen door here is no black grease marks all over the door where the pull it closed , I would have to wipe it down daily or we would look like we were dirty slobs when people came to the door. Also they have a texture at the fingertips which allow a better feeling when touch is important,

These are much more puncture/tear resistant than the latex gloves we've been buying. We work a lot with rescue dogs and most arrive having skin issues so these are so nice because we can apply treatments without having to double up on wearing 2 pairs of latex gloves so we can get through a treatment now with one pair of these nitrile ones without them breaking through.Even though the latex ones are cheaper per 100 box, we actually were spending more money on the latex because we always had to wear 2 pairs as they broke apart so easily!  So if you are watching your pennies and have to double up on the latex gloves continually you might want to switch to these nitrile ones and save a little $$ and frustration!

I really like this fragrance it is light and floral, not overpowering at all. I am very sensitive to most perfumy products like fabric softeners and scented detergents, this is just right. I use 3 sprays and it works surprisingly well  and it doesn't give me a headache like most perfumy things do.So why the 4 stars instead of 5?Well the bottle is a regular type spray bottle and to use it to aim INTO the bowl you need to hold at a horizontal angle down pretty far down into the bowl if you do not want to spray the seat, and as you use the contents up, your ability to tilt it and produce a full spray lessens!For $10.00 ($9.44 plus tax) this is too pricey to lose the remainder due to the sprayer not working when tilted almost horizontally  to get it into the bowl. So I deducted one star for that, maybe they will read this and find a way to revise the spray pump to work when held horizontally.I would definitely rebuy a 2 OZ bottle to take w/me when traveling and visiting friends if they could fix that spray issue.

These leather sparring gloves are so nice and so much better than the synthetic Everlast cheapos that we had been using and they were only about $20 more than what we paid for the Everlast but soooo worth it!!We should have gotten them a long time ago if not just for the nice leather smell!However if you have really large hands these might not fit you as they run a bit small IMO.My husband is 5' 10" and medium build shoe size 10.5 and normally takes a size large in driving/winter gloves, says these fit him perfectly.He also says that they disperse the impact so much better than the Everlast ones he was using.My son who is 6' 2" and wears a size 15 shoe and XL driving gloves said that these are too small/tight for him which is too bad as I wanted to get another pair for him.

I usually get the Expo low odor  chisel tip markers, these are very comparable to them. Some have commented on the odor, they do have an odor, the listing says LOW ODOR, not odorless! So don't think they are "unscented"! As for their colors and tips, as good as any others I've used. Then why the 2 stars??They are "Amazon Basics", they are supposed to be a better value, these are more expensive than my name brand Expo low odor chisel tip markers that are for sale here on Amazon! Expo's are $10.18 and Amazon's are $12.64 and I don't see any difference in size or x marker "juice" inside etc... So maybe when you see this review the price will have gone down, I hope that someone in Amazon reads this and they adjust the price down to make these a better value. Then I would give them a 5 star review but right now, I would buy the other ones and save  about $2.50!This is the first Amazon Basics item that I didn't like and I buy Amazon Basics stuff ALL the time!

My husband and boys have always worn Dockers so when I selected these for my son I assumed even though they are "slim & tapered" they would fit around the waist the same. I was wrong, I think we needed the next size up 34X32 instead of the 32X32.Other than that they are well constructed as the norm is with Docker products, so if you order up a size you should be good. We were only offered this one size to review so we have no way to exchange them for the next size up to be perfectly sure. If you have these at a local store and you are like me (you won't be able to drag your men folk in to try them on) measure the waist of their current pants that fit them well and measure these there and see what size will work for you, to be absolutely sure. If Docker's wants me to compare these with the next size up just let me know, I would gladly do an exchange!

These are very well made and heavy duty while looking nice. You can hold the hottest baking pan for a very long time without any fear of the heat coming through, also I have all stainless steel appliances and these look nice with them and my other grey accents throughout the kitchen.

Great big NO for me, I gave it a generous 2 stars if you were wanting to using this in a place just that views JUST your pet (like a kennel or garage etc..........NOT for inside your home!!Ok, while it is easy to set up, is well made for what it is, picture quality is decent compared to similar models (but nothing exceptional) and with the lag time from when movement is detected  to when he video starts, the issues I have are not even with the fee you would have to pay if you wanted to to get content stored, it is that your content is being streamed to some server most likely in CHINA!They provide NO  erms of use or privacy info ANYWHERE! !You have no idea even if it is encrypted, how long they hold it (the free version) if it is backed up or most importantly who else can see it! If you search online you will see that the company is located in Hong Kong ("C H I N A") even though they have a US tel number in NJ.Which raises the question, just WHERE is the content streaming to?Me thinks with the lag time in it, it is going far, Far awaaaaaay.....NOT being sent just to NJ and even if it was just going to a server in NJ, do you really want streaming video of inside your home "OUT THERE" for whomever to see/hack/spy on you...... not moi!This baby is going bye bye.....

I have to give the author credit, when I first read the synopsis I thought this book may be over my head in technicalities. Myself, coming from a not-super-techy background, I was very impressed on how well written this book was to cater to people from all backgrounds.It's crazy how this books reads like something you might see from a CSI movie or Mr. Robot but this actually REALLY happened!However, unlike a lot of those shows it really goes into detail on the legal happenings of what it takes to get someone locked up for virtual crimes.It was a very captivating read, something I'd definitely recommend for anyone in the Computer Science / Law field who would like to see how things happen in real life.

This is probably one of my best purchases for my home office in a long time. I've used it for everything from running printers to desktops to extending the range on my external HDDs. The real thing I love is that this isn't just a USB extension, it actually takes and repeats the signal coming from the original source. That way it doesn't lose any of its strength or transfer rate. If you are planning on extending any of your peripherals over anything over 5-6 meters go for a repeater! If it was available in 3.0 I would give it 4 stars! There is another usb 2.0 repeater cable (B008VOPEQW) here on Amazon, like this that one that I've found has a bit faster transfer speed but it is quite a bit more money (about TWICE the $$ more for the same length), so for my purposes I am very happy with this one. Works fine!

Bummer, they really, REALLY should put somewhere in the description that while it can be used for a .22 caliber pistol, it can ONLY do so IF you buy the additional .22 jag!As it is, it only comes w/ a bore for a .45 caliber, I ordered it for my .22 Browning pistol.....:-/It looks like it would not hold or attract dirt on the rod with its glossy surface and they say that it is chemical resistant but I'm not buying an additional jag so I'll never know unless I get a .45, into the junk drawer it goes, sigh.......

I read the other reviews before selecting this so I was aware that it will not hold more than a few small items but I do not have a lot of accessories in the bedroom where I mounted this unit so no problems there.I also painted the vertical bar that the cables/wires run through the same color as my walls so inow t blends in with the walls! It looks pretty much like there is just the floating shelf under the TV!  "Kewl"  ;-)The only caveat I have for this is that I think ANY shelf that is Glass should be attached with some  heavy-duty drywall anchors, they included just about every option BUT that with this. They don't cost much but it was a pain in the butt to have to go to the store to get some, I mean really, it would have cost them a few cents to include them in the package. I take off 1 star for that, otherwise I really like this.I would also like to order another one like it (or larger) for my son's room but I would need at least 2 shelfs for all his accessories, *hint, hint mnfr......

Great quality, soft 100% cotton, excellent stitching on ends, no loose threads or uneven weave or irregularities in the cloth itself. High quality that are well made, don't be afraid to get these and they are PURE WHITE, not an off shade, I am very pleased with them.

Ok just so you know while I LOVE the "Garden of Life" products, you might want to rethink WHEN (what season it is) you are ordering this if you have an outside mailbox in the summertime as it is not supposed to be stored over 71 degrees..... yeah my mailbox is like an oven in the summer so I just hope some of those good little critters survived a day in the sauna....sigh!So if you have a PO box you don't have to consider the temperature of your mailbox when you order this. they ARE shelf stable to 71 degree, I relly liked that they came in 20 premeasured packets and had absolutely NO SUGAR!YAY!!!!And as icing on the cake they are absolutely flavorless!None of what someone else thinks is "a pleasant tasting" artificial or natural flavor added to them.They mix into water easily as they state and the only caveat is that you need to make sure the liquid is not warm or hot as that will kill them before they get a chance to work!

What a royal pain in the butt! I mean it is supposed to be a simple power strip with surge protection right...... WRONG!Besides 6 of the plugs being too close together so that any of your larger plugs cannot be plugged in side by side so you only have the 2 set apart at the end for those larger ones. Now that is not why I don't care for this, I'm just pointing that out in case you have more than 2 of those that need to be on this power strip/surge protector.What my issue is that they have what they are calling a Master outlet" it states that it wll also turn of devices that are idle! Yeah so if what you have plugged into the "master outlet" is turned off, or in sleep mode, the other things plugged into the rest of the outlets will NOT turn on. The other outlets are what they call "energy saving controlled outlets". You need to make certain that WHATEVER you put in that "MASTER" outlet, will be staying turned on ALWAYS (* like your wifi if you have it etc...) yeah, so how  then does the power savings work if you need the Master plug activated 24/7 to access the TV, playstation etc when you want to use them? This is not "rocket surgery"...errrr science!

I already have a full sized roller for our backs so when I was offered this shorter one I figured it would be great as it will fit in my gym bag  when I run to the gym to take a class and want to stretch before and after I take a class.While it is very portable, it is so short that I can't use it comfortably for my back. Unless you are very pettit, this is only good for your sides or abs, not for your back, I kept rolling off it. To be fair that is not the roller's fault, I mean it says it is only 12",  I just didn't realize it was too short to roll my back comfortably.It is a little cheaper than the "non Amazon basic" rollers,  so that is always good.Yes, it was made in China but so was my full sized Non Amazon basic roller. It rolls fine, no flat spots, another plus is it is Amazon's product so should you get a lemon there is no hassle if you get a "lemon" and it degrades with use down the road.

This has to be one of the best designed cables I've ever had, my son said 1/2 my TV problem was my cheap cables!He got these for me and when I opened the package and took them out I could see what he meant, they have that feeling of quality, with the heavy duty braided casing, it's really impressive. I had recently just purchased a 4k TV and upon setting it up I was having issues with the output, which is where I found out about the new and old generation HDMI cables from my son. If you're planning on streaming anything in 4k MAKE SURE your cables are HDMI 2.0. Otherwise the quality of the video will not be what the TV is truly capable of.
This arrived quickly and worked perfectly, it's an ipad, what more can I say than everyone has already said!!

Know let me start out by saying that in general TRENDnet usually has top notch products and I assumed this would be a pretty decent "newer tech" style camera...Nowhere did I see that it required a CD drive, yeah...... helloooooo ...it is 2015!!So,*Unless you have a computer w/ a CD drive and it is connected by a cable to your router....you might want to "fah-git-about-it".There is a lengthy "go-around" that their customer service can walk you through but even if you go through all that and get it running you will have no way to do firmware update!  This needs a WIRED computer with a CD drive to install updates!Now if you are one of the lucky ones and have everything needed to get yours up and running be aware that even though this says it has 2 way audio, they are playing with words... It does have 2 way audio CAPABILITY, not 2 way audio  out of the box, unless you buy a speaker and plug it into the port they have for a speaker.*If a company says on the box 2 way audio, you would assume everything it lists would be (should be) included in the box!OH, and another thing before you invest in a big memory card, while it has the software that allows you to ENABLE a memory card, the only way you can READ it is to physically put it in a device/computer  & read it on them!So if these issues are not dealbreakers and you don't mind a potential call or 2 to customer service to get the setup kinks ironed out, this does have a decent picture and functions remotely very well, (*unless you live someplace where storms hit and your power goes out. If this is you there are issues with getting it to keep the default settings you put in it!)So if you are a tech savvy person and know going into this that it has these issues, you might be pleased with its features, it just isn't the right one for us.

OK, I got this as I am VERY familiar with the orange powder and thought this "shot" would be great for when I'm traveling and I get a tension headache from heavy traffic when I'm commuting several hours each way and don't always have a bottle of water to mix up a powder and don't want to pull off a ramp to get some.I thought it would be very similar in flavor and effectiveness as the orange powder.....Well I thought WRONG!I would rather pull of with a splitting headache and fight traffic to get water to take a Goody's orange powder than to chug another one of these!To make matters worse I tried it while I was driving and had nothing to get the taste out of my mouth!Now it DID work.......so I am giving it 3 stars, so it is very effective, works about as fast as the powder.It is just not pleasant to take without something to get the taste out!I gave the rest of mine to my daughter, she says I am a wimp.She takes a drink of her mocha latte and swigs it down  without a blink, I don't know how she does it!Blech!!

Ok here is the scoop on this latest addition the the Goody's line up.This Mixed fruit Blast flavor is a nice change from the orange one we usually keep on hand.  Most of my family likes it as much as the orange,.No one likes the plain ones here!While it isn't a "fruit Juice Drink" flavor, it is not bad at all IMOIt also helps mask the bitter aftertaste that these powders tend to leave but even with that "aftertaste" issue that some people are more sensitive to than others, everyone that takes these will tell you that when you are in pain they would rather have these and their faster delivery and a moment of aftertaste, than taking a pill and waiting F-O-R-E-V-E-R for the pain relief to kick in!As always do not take more than 4 within 24 hours and IF you consume alcoholic beverages limit them to 3 per day you are taking these.You can read more about the contraindications in their website at goodys.comIngredients are as follows:Acetaminophen 325 mg Pain reliever / Fever reducerAspirin (NSAID)* 500 mg Pain reliever / Fever reducer*nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugEach powder contains: potassium 60 mg

OK, so I am one of those gadget people.....We had a spiralizer for about 3 months before we saw this recipe book, which was great timing as my enthusiasm (and my family's) for all things "zoodly" was waning fast!*BTW you can get a spiralizer very inexpensively now on Amazon,but I digress, the timing for this recipe book was perfect for us as I had pretty much thought I had exhausted the meal options for my beloved zoodles.But OH! Wait! There's more you say......... (sorry couldn't resist the "infomercial" in me) ;-PThis book is BIG on easy flavorful and quick meals, *one of our newest favorites is the Shrimp with slow roasted tomatoes and zucchini linguine.I've attached pictures so you can see the steps and how delish it looks and can better imagine how good it tasted.My only negative would be that there are not many pictures (there are only about a dozen) I really like to see how, what I am making, is supposed to look when finished. Even though it is weak in that area we found the recipes to be excellent and flavorful and a great jumping off point to customize many of them to suit our family's tastebuds. Like with this shrimp recipe, it goes without saying all the various protein substitutes you can do to this along with spicing it up or into a more ethnic version with your favorite spices.See my pictures of this recipe, it was A mazing!! It is worth getting this cookbook just for this dish alone (and there are even MORE where that came from) Yumm O!

My first impression was, "WOW", sharp looking headset. You can tell some thought went into this design.I would say that the very best thing about them is their sound system.After testing them for an entire day the feature I am most impressed by is the GREAT sound options that you can customize to whatever you are doing whether listening to music with the pure direct bass boost  or the clear chat during game play.The movie theater dolby surround option is not just for watching movies, when in a fps game it gives you an edge with the assistance it provides with footsteps etc. It also has a competitor & stereo mode that are pretty good as well.  It is totally customizable to suit YOUR preferences in different situations. *The Cue software it has allows you to control the headset, keyboard & mouse as well!Now for the not so awesome features...OK, it is EITHER going to be the cool lights or the run time due to the battery consumption of those cool lights.....Oh the choices we have to make...sigh......If you use this with the lights on (*you can select any color  you want and 11 different effects!) but that will only give you about 6 hours of play before they need to be re charged.If you disable the lights  (*which btw also disables the notifications on the mic, so NOT cool!) you get about 20 hours of playYeah....your choice. If you are a casual user for only a few hours a day, no biggie but if you are like any of my friends this is a MAJOR issue!You decide but for me that is a HUGE miss!Also as for the comfort, it is so-so. while they are well cushioned and feel great at first, after hours of play I noticed that they kept creeping forward, which is not a deal breaker, just annoying at times when you are sitting for hours and not taking a break and removing them more frequently than I do while gaming or whatever....The mic is just OK, it would be better if you could adjust it in and out, not just up and down and leave the light feature on for it to send notifications when disabling lights on the rest of the headset to extend the battery life for all day/night playing....Construction is average for a headset in this price point. There are strengths and weaknesses.  The average headset at this point usually lasts me about a year of heavy use.....it looks like these should do that. I will update if they fail anywhere.Overall I am pleased with them, they are not perfect but more towards a 4 than a 3 star rating IMO

I foolishly clicked on the video while perusing the listing for this, deciding if I was going to select this Leather ipad2 case or not......I should have paid more attention to the listing, if you read it closely, in very small print it says the "other" items shown below and in the video are NOT included, they are sold separately.....So as you have by now guessed, it does NOT come with the Agility Dock or the Agility Power Base. if you want the whole set as seen in the video it is going to cost you another $99.00...OUCH!!They really should put in BIG letters on the video OPTIONAL items, not included in "Bundle", I mean it is the first item they show, so it isn't apparent that is not part of the"Bundle"So this "bundle" is not complete as implied......other than that it works as described. the case looks very well made and posh. It performs as easy as in the video, I like being able to switch from landscape to portrait by swiveling the case instead of turning the whole case on its side like my current keyboard case/cover. I've already dropped it from counter top height and no problems,...whew!! It has a unisex look to it. It is not aimed at either gender by the color and I just love leather!!I have not had the issue with the mount needing to be reglued t but then I've only had it for a little while. I really wanted that power base and dock but not enough to pay about $100 more for that! Major Bummer....Other than that it feels soo nice and functions well, no hiccups, so far so good!

My A/C is the main reason our electric bill is OUTRAGEOUS, I have a houseful of people that leave AFTER I do (college kids) and turning down the A/C when they leave is never at the top of their thoughts as they rush out the door to get to class. This lets me stop fighting with them and take control of the matter without having to be upset when I come home and find the A/C has been running all day at a low temp!  So if you are the one that pays the electric bill but are not the last one to leave your home each day, GET THIS!!  Not only will it save you money it will keep peace in the family/home if you have someone else living with you that can't remember to turn the A/C off (or higher) when they leave for the day!Now if you were just wanting an  "app"  to replace your remote controller for your A/C system I would say pass, this smart A/C control only controls the very basic functions of off and on and adjusting the temperature. It does not control the speed of the fan or anything else your RF remote that came with your A/C does.What this can do is remotely, (VERY remotely!)from waaaay away from home, turn it off for you IF, you, in a mad dash to get to work, forgot to turn it down  and left it running full blast! If that is you, this will save you LOADS of $$! But FIRST if you have an older A/C unit check their website for information on supported units. If yours is not on the list but does have an RF controller they say that it most likely can work but it will take a bit more time setting it up as like with any remote it has all the most popular "brands" pre set info at the top pf the list and then as you go down the list to find the correct setting for yours. you may need to test each one until you get to one that works for your A/C unit.  We used it with our ihone 6 and did not have any problem but one person said they had an older phone that they couldn't  get to work with theirs so as long as you are at their website looking at the A/C units you might want to check that out also if you have an older phone. *They have an online LIVE "chat" option so you can just ask them any other questions you might have!

When they came in they were a bit larger in the waistband but after washing and drying on regular heat they snugged up a bit to fit exactly as they were supposed to. They are well made and the stitching is good, the fit is good and the color is rich. I added some white vinegar to the wash water to help set the dye so they stay dark like they are now.

I live in the south and my family just loves fried foods (who doesn't!?) but as that's not healthy for you, we rarely indulged in them. Well now with this Delonghi Low Oil multifryer  we can have them as often as we want without feeling guilty.There are so many things this fryer/cooker can do besides just your run of the mill  french fries and fish, there is even a free app here with an ever expanding, online recipe book that you can install here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.delonghi.kitchenapp.prod&hl=en_GBI am going through a stir frying phase as this takes all the work out of cooking it with the stirring mechanism and the non stick ceramic coated pan makes clean up a breeze! The pan is dishwasher safe but it is just as easy (and faster) to wash it out with a soapy sponge or nylon scrubby. I am so SO glad that they did not use teflon (like so many other manufacturers do) for their non stick surface as it would have negated the health aspect of this low oil, multi cooker.Sure it costs a bit more than some but look at how it is made and all it can do from frying to baking or cooking fast or slow full sized one pot family meals like stir fry or chili! They thought of everything even the clear lid so you can see the progress of your dish without letting all the heat out.As for the convection fan, in the multi cooker, noise aspect I would say it is quieter than me running my gas oven or stove's hood/ exhaust fan on high, (like I do when I'm cooking) to vent out all the heat that cranking up that range/oven gives off! Not to mention the energy savings running that small tabletop appliance verses my oversized gas oven which in turns makes my refrigerator work harder and my A/C!So if you really look at what it offers, I think you would agree it ends up being very economical and portable to boot!This has a relatively small footprint (aout a foot wide and high and about 15'"deep) as far as "fryer" that can cook family sized servings at 1 time. I've found that the key to getting food really crisp faster is not to over crowd and it comes out nice and cripy that way also.

I have very dry skin, that said, this Gel/Cream certainly did moisturize it rapidly with no greasy residue. I applied it right after washing my face and it did a very good job of making my normally tight and dry skin feel moist and supple all day. Now if you like a dewy fresh face look (no matter your age) this will definitely deliver! If you are looking for a fast absorbing cream for under your make up, you may want to test it on a weekend to see how rapidly your skin absorbs it all in so it is dry enough to apply makeup over it.  I only have to wait about 10 minutes but my daughter who only has dry "areas"  on her face had to wait about 1/2 an hour until her face wasn't so tacky feeling. Once you get the correct amount and now the timing there is no problem. It is loaded with mineral nutrients from the Dead sea in Israel for your skin's health and  has a pleasant light scent/fragrance to it that dissipates in about 15 minutes.

Admittedly, I never volunteer to open wine or champagne bottles as it always seems a daunting and frightening task. Although most bottle openers are purchased at low cost for home use, not all are and this product is certainly different.Sent to me for review, this product comes very well presented in a very modern and retro box and has 2 separate units inside, held by protected foam, a simple photo user guide and a hand written note.The 2 set pieces are made of high quality material that's fit for purpose with the main materials in question being the steel 'body' and chrome on the exterior.In terms of design they have a 3 in 1 function as they can be used as a corkscrew, bottle opener or serrated knife for removing the top foil. You also get the bottle stopper.In use, I found that these worked very well and I didn't have any issues with opening bottles. They were a good size and had fit for purpose designs. These would also make a good gift to give to someone along with other gifts.

This product was sent to me for review and my biggest concern was will it fit my large sized yoga / pilates mat. Thankfully it did!.From a quality point of view, it's high quality with a less smooth harder material on the outside and a much smoother material on the inside. It closes via a zip and has a shoulder strap that's removable at one end.There is a zipped pocket on the outside thats ideal for holding your phone, car keys, purse, wallet etc. The pocket is more than twice the size of a hand (approx) in width and there are ventilation holes at the bottom of the bag. There is also a netted zipped pocket inside for either holding similar items as listed above or something different.In use, I found that this protected my mat very well and it saved the yoga / pilates mat from having a soaking when it was taken from the car park to the yoga class in my nearest town. When my mat is stored at home I usually have it on top of my wardrobe and it gathers dust unnecessarily. This protects it from that too.

This product was sent to me for review. It's a reasonably decent music box with quite a nice smooth design on the outside and an all pink matte design on the inside.At 400g it's medium weight and at 15.5cm x 11.5cm  x 11.5cm it's medium sized.The level of detailing is quite good and there are 5 compartments inside to hold your little girls plastic jewellery.There is no lock on this (as expected) and you need to take the inner piece from inside and turn  the bottom of it to get it going. The sound quality is a bit tinny but acceptable.There is a small ballerina inside which you put on the spring and it controls the sound as you open and close it.Verdict = 7/10

Sent to me for review, power banks are extremely popular at the moment and the race is on to  come up with a different design as many look very similar. This product certainly has managed that!.It comes presented in a transparent plastic case and on the whole looks very appealing in terms of presentation.If you are looking for a gift to give to someone that uses a battery hungry device then this would be ideal, along with other gifts of course!.It's well made and with dimensions of 4.17 x 2.24 x 0.4cm it's about the same size as a smartphone. I received the blue colour and I was more than happy with my choice.All the operational 'controls' are located at one end and here we find the power button, in port for charging and the USB flexible rubber / silicone cable for external charging via an 8 PIN connector. The LEDs are very useful as they tell you what level of charge you have left.At 3200mAh this is a small to medium size in capacity classifications and I have been using it faithfully to charge my iPhone 6. It's worked very well and I can't get over how nice it feels in my hand with it's smoothness and how thin it is.

My partner bought these for us last year as we were having a Halloween party in our house and we only had a strict budget to work with.The stickers are made of high quality material that's fit for purpose. They are well made, have a nice design and good quality artwork.Applying the stickers to the correct locations was reasonably straightforward and the bubbles generated underneath the stickers were easy to get rid of.The product looked very good on our white toilet seat but not as effective on the black toilet seat. The feedback that we had from the party guests was of a positive nature (along with  a couple of screams!) and they hadn't seen anything as unique as it before. They didn't expect to see any props in the bathroom.The stickers were not as easy to remove and I ended up ripping the seat sticker to an unusable state. It is possible to use them again but you have to do it very slowly and carefully.I believe that the product offers good value for money given the price tag and I would therefore recommend it.

This product was sent to me for review. These solar lights are more ideal for outdoor use than indoor use and come in a decent box with all the instructions and product details well documented on the side.They are good quality and consist of a 39ft  'cable', 100 'LEDs' and a solar panel connected to a 'pole' or 'spike' that you 'stab' into the ground. The solar panel unit comes in 3 parts and took seconds to put together.Once mounted, you can adjust the solar panel via the adjustment mechanism and having it in the ground lets you move it left, right, forward and backwards. There is a power and mode button (8 modes) on these and with the 'warm white / yellow' produced they are ideal for any time of year.What I like about these is that you don't need electricity to power them and they seem to pick up light well. They also have a waterproof and durable design and the 8 modes offer a great deal of choice.

This product was sent to me for review and it's the first battery powered ones that I have tried out.They come very well presented in a decent box with plenty of useful information inside along with an user manual.The cable itself is 52.5ft in size and it has 200 small LEDs at the end of each section.These don't come with batteries but take the chunky D-R20 types, 3 in total. The box that they go in is very military in design and has a water proof look and feel to it.On the left of the battery compartment you get a switch which controls 8 different modes with each being well labelled.These offer a very good amount of diversity and they worked very well. They are a brighter and darker blue than you see in the Amazon photos but nonetheless they are sufficient bright and are appealing.These can be used indoors or outdoors but be careful where you place the battery box. I bought a 100 set of 'heavy duty' outdoor lights a few years ago and they only lasted a few days. I put my light box for these inside a resealable food bag and it offered terrific protection.

This product was sent to me for review and comes in a 7oz / 210ml plastic bottle. The nozzle on this is similar to what you get with a hand-wash and makes it so much easier to use.It contains a significant amount of ingredients with some being coconut oil, sunflower, castor seed, argan oil, apple and cucumber.It's always going to be difficult to identify any specific scents when you have so many but the overall scent for me was more lemony / citrusy than anything else.To use this effectively you need to pump out 2 lots into your palm and massage it into the face, and then rinse it off. I found that it worked well and made my skin look cleaner and made my face feel clean and refreshed. Just what I wanted before going to work!.

This product was sent to me for review and it came in a decent box with instructions included inside. Other useful information is also well documented on the box so the overall presentation was excellent.The quality of the product is high given the price point and the sacrifice that you have to make when you go for battery powered ones is that you will need to buy 3 1.5V batteries. They certainly weren't cheap and the best deal available on Amazon at the time was 4 Panasonic ones with free delivery (I had to borrow some from my neighbour before mine turned up because non prime deliveries can take ages).The cable is 13.1ft in length and there are 50 LEDs spread out over that area. The battery box is very military and that along with the rest of the product is green. There are 8 varied modes on the control box and these offer a good amount of options.In use, I found that these worked very well and I really liked the light colour that they produced. They can be used indoors or outdoors and if you cannot find an area that receives the least amount of rainfall then you can put a resealable zipped food bag around them. Not essential but it's what I do.

This product was sent to me for review. The quality is good (for the price point) and the materials in question are plastic and metal. The size is large and the mass is lightweight.The design on this is modern and boho and the beads are oval shaped. The chain is extendable and attaches via a clasp. What I like about this is the colour and geometric pattern.I found that these were more ideal in a formal setting such as a wedding but also in informal settings such as cinema, casual dining or going out drinking. It goes well with smart clothes with a nice blouse being a top pick or a nice dress of a turquoise colour.

I decided to buy this on a friends recomendation. It's well labelled and has quite a nice 'taste' in the mouth. Sadly, it's effects on whitening were minimum and barely noticeable but it did help somewhat with my tooth sensitivity. When I had a toothache I actually rubbed it into my tooth and left it there. It made a difference for sure.

Art therapy books are extremely popular at the moment and they seem to be with everyone I know, including me!. This pencil set was sent to me for review and come in a set of 36, 48 and 72. I received the 72 so I could comment on all 72 colours.The quality is good given the price point (colouring pencils are not cheap these days) and they are hexagonal in design which means that they give you a better grip (much better than the circular type).They are normal coloured pencils and not water coloured and the 72 offers an excellent range of colours with some colours being present more than others (e.g - 5 reds, 4 oranges, 4 yellows, 9 pinks, 6 purples, 12 blues and a very rare mint!).In use, I found these to be nice to draw with and they are quite waxy on the paper / books. There were plenty of warm colours to choose from  (e.g yellows, pinks, reds, oranges, purples) and an adequate amount of 'Cold colours' (e.g blue, green, brown, black).The pencils are an ideal size for teenagers and adults (average sized pencils). Our 6 year old uses pencils that are half the size but the quality is not as good. With my experience in this field I would say that the 36 set would offer enough colours for children about 7-8+, the 48 size would offer enough of a selection for teenagers and non artist adults whilst the 72 size would be more ideal for more skilled artists.

This product was sent to me for review and is the second set that I have received in 3 weeks. They come in a small box along with a microfibre cloth and a drawstring bag (there are no instructions).There are 3 lenses in the box; wide angle lens, macro lens and fisheye. They attach to a clip and then you clip the clip onto the outer section of your camera. I've tried them on several devices and they worked OK.They are quite easy to attach and once cleaned / attached the end results were quite good. The  wide angle lens increased about 50% of the viewing angle so you can see more from the same distance. The macro lens allows you to take close shots of tiny objects and the fish eye gives you a 180 Deg view, highlighting the objects in the middle.

This product was sent to me for review and my first impressions were of a very well made thermometer (for the price point).I've come across thermometers like these before and they are usually thin and fairly small. This is the exact opposite as its chunky and longer. The instructions are documented on the back with more useful instructions on the Amazon product description page. Sadly, this did not come with batteries but it only needs 1 AAA.It's easy to use and gives you readings within a few seconds. It can operate from -50 Deg C to +300 Deg C. In use I found this to work well and be accurate. I really liked its chunky design and you can fold it back on itself when not in use so you hide the temperature probe. The probe is quite a good size but would be more ideal if it was slightly longer. It's also got an auto off mode which activates after 10 min.

This product was sent to me for review and came in a small toothpaste sized box. Inside the box you get a hand sized 15ml hard plastic tube with sealed plastic surrounding it.The applicator delivers an accurate shot of white cream that has a very appealing and unique scent. Although there are a number of different ingredients present, the one that came through the strongest was the rose.I've been using this for about 2 weeks and found that it was best to apply after cleansing and toning and half a 'pump' application was enough to cover both eyes.It certainly made a difference as the areas around my eyes were slightly smoother, softer and healthier looking in general. There is still a lot left so it will no doubt last a long time.Verdict: 4.5 / 5

This product was sent to me for review and comes in a 5oz / 150ml hard plastic bottle.It contains a number of healthy ingredients with 25 ingredients being 'Fat fighting stimulators'.It has an applicator that's similar to a hair mouse applicator and squirts out a white foam that has a pleasant scent with lemon coming through the strongest.It absorbs well into the skin and I can't stress enough how little you should use each time or it will be super greasy.Approx 2 weeks after receiving it, it did make a difference but only a minor one. It seemed to last forever and the 5oz / 150ml should last quite a while!.

We bought these last Halloween and had low expectations due to their price. We thought that we would at least try them as we only had a small budget to work with.There are 3 in a pack and they measure about 35 inches in length. To save you getting the ruler out, that's about the same height as your kitchen bench or waist height for many.They are essentially balloons with a plastic sheet (ghost bags) and twist ties.The quality and artwork is a bit disappointing but OK for the money. They were a bit of a fiddle to put together and there were certainly no 'willing victims' for the task.We firstly placed them outdoors and found that the wind blew them too much. They were better indoors, especially when placed relatively near the doors. If its not windy outside though they are suitable for outdoors.Would we buy these again?. Probably not but they were worth trying at this price point and the kids liked them.

Sent to me for reviewing purposes, this product is presented in a soft, black velvet, drawstring bag.The quality is good and it's made of alloy with a silver tone. It's medium weight and is medium to large sized at 35 x 17 x 1.5mm.The design is modern, unique, sci-fi and geometric somewhat and I really like the shape of this. They attach via a slip on attachment.I found that this was more ideal in an informal setting such as certain workplaces and shopping for example with a nice blouse and jeggings (spelt correctly) of any colour.

Note: This product can be used with both indoor and outdoor plants.Sent to me for review its made of good quality material that's fit for purpose and whilst the 19cm long probe is made of a bronze coloured metal the 8 x 5 x 3cm upper section is made of a green plastic with a 3.7 x 2.1cm viewing panel with the measuring numbers ranging from 1-10 with 1 being the driest and 10 being the wettest.Now before anyone jumps to a conclusion that all plants must be somewhere in the middle of the scale think again as each plant requires an ideal range and these are printed on the back of the packaging. In total there are approx 150 plants listed and that's very useful information to have at hand as not all meters supply it.It does not require any batteries to use it you just insert the probe into the root area and make note of what the reading is. Once you have finished you simply wipe the probe clean and dry it carefully. You then adjust the moisture levels of the soil accordingly and continue to monitor each plant on a frequent basis using the guide at the back.For anyone that might be thinking "yes but my plant is not on the list, how do I know what moisture levels it needs a lot of plants come with a plastic insert which gives you that information included when to water it and what sunlight conditions it needs. If it doesn't have it then you can obtain the information from a reliable website after you have types in 'plant moisture level guide' into a well know search engine (Amazons reviewing guidelines does not allow reviewers to add Internet links on reviews I'm afraid).

This product was sent to me for review and comes in a resealable pack. There are no instructions included but there is an adequate amount of information available on the product description page.There are 4 in a pack and they are lightweight and slightly longer than a 20 note in size. They appear to be made of plastic and have a relatively simple yet effective design.There are 2 main 'pads' at each end with one cover being removable with a cable tie strap design to attach both ends together. On the back of the pads there is a 3M adhesive which attaches to a draw, cupboard etc.In use, I found these to be a good size and they adhered well onto our kitchen cupboards and our wooden lounge draws. To open the drawer, fridge door etc you just remove the blue 'pad' and place it back when you have closed the drawer.

I've always been amazed at how many people don't monitor the moisture and pH levels of their plants and these days, there are many products available which can do it easily for you and most are incredibly simple to use.Sent to me for review, this product is classed as a 3:1 meter as it measures pH, moisture levels and light. At 27.5 x 4.5 x 3.5 cm its a few cm shorter than a full sized ruler and at 118g it's lightweight due to the thin probes making up 3/4 of its length.To use this you just insert the probe deep into the bottom of the roots and wait for the meters readings to stabilise. In general, 15-20 seconds should be ample time and the results are then displayed very clearly with a separate test scale for each.Upon completion of the test(s) you just clean the probes and match your indoor / outdoor plant type to the chart at the back of the pack. What's good about this is that it doesn't need any batteries and takes up very little space in your drawer.

When this arrived from the seller to review, I expected it to be just another sleeping mask with a near identical design to the others that I have seen - I was wrong!.As soon as I took if out of the resealable bag it was evident that it was completely different in every way possible.Firstly, at a glance, it looks like a bra (somewhat). The 2 cups are much thicker than normal and have memory foam. Secondly, the strap can be adjusted via a strong velcro.I found that having the cups large and more padded with memory foam covered more of my eyes, blocking out more light and the wider velcro secured it better to my head. It was comfortable to wear too.

In terms of presentation and design of the product, a lot of bluetooth speakers look the same and its welcoming to see something different. This was sent to me for review and certainly offers something different in a positive way.It's well made yet lightweight and looks and feels built to last. The design is very modern, retro and military / marine and has a structural design built to withstand water splashes (waterproof rating = IP67).All the controls are large and chunky and well protected and there is an attachment on top which allows you to hang it up via the supplied lanyard hook.My iPhone identified it as 'HAVIT M5' and paired with it without the requirement to enter any codes. The sound quality was good with moderate bass and the pads at the bottom kept it steady on a flat surface.I tested all the buttons and features and found them to work well. Bluetooth signal was good and I did not have any problems with it.

There are a significant amount of earphones available these days and many look the same. These however look different.This product was sent to me for review and came quite nicely packaged in a modern box which contained the PECHAM S5 earphones, USB charging cable, drawstring bag, a small amount of spare tips, user manual and a QC card.The quality is good and whilst the cable is flattened rather than circular, the main earphone units are glossed and large in size. Having them large means that they are easier to handle and the buttons are bigger whilst the downside is they are more noticeable to others.All the controls are located on one earphone and all the options are controlled via 2 side buttons and the multi function button. These paired with my iPhone 6 in a few seconds and the sound quality was good, clear with plenty of bass with the bass masking the clearness at times.

This product was sent to me for review and is made in the USA. It comes in a 6oz / 180ml plastic bottle with a screw off top with a small entry hole underneath.The amount of ingredients are overwhelming with some of the most beneficial being aloe, bilberry orange, fruit extracts, cranberry, papaya, pineapple enzymes and vitamin C.It does not contain parabens, toxins, phthalates, artificial fragrances, colours, formaldehyde, mineral oil, retinols, petrolatum sulfates and is not tested on animals.With so many different ingredients it targets a number of different areas with some of the claimed benefits being lightening and brightening your complexion, lightens sun spots and exfoliating skin.Directions (in order):- Cleanse face- Apply to the face using a cotton wool ball in an upward direction- Allow to dry- MoisturiseIn use, I found that this was extremely runny with a very tiny tinge of yellow and no scent came from it. Because of its runny-ness I only used a very small amount each time and found it was best to use it in the morning rather than at night.The results were good and there was a noticeable difference to the appearance of my skin, especially in how it brightened up my skin. My sun spots were also slightly lighter.

I must admit that I've never been a big fan of electric salt and pepper grinders as they don't seem to last for long enough in terms of durability.This product in particular was sent to me for review and stands at a similar height to a 1L milk carton or large hand. The quality is good (mainly stainless steel) and the design is modern.Unfortunately you will need 6 (yes - six) AAA batteries and they don't come with it so you will need to factor that into the price point. To open the battery compartment you just align the arrows and twist.I loaded this with black pepper corn which I already had in the house and it worked well, a few minutes latter producing sufficiently fine pepper 'powder' with the unit being able to control the 'fine-ness' by twisting the bottom to +/-. It also has an LED light at the bottom which comes on when you grind the peppercorn.As an added bonus you get a 2 years warranty and for me that's very important because our last 2 only lasted 12 months and 18 months respectively. I will update this review if the unit fails so that customers have an idea of how long it lasted.

This product was sent to me for review. I must admit that I've never particularly liked cutting cheese as I'm always conscious of cutting my hand / fingers so I keep it far away and end up with slices of cheese that are far too thick!.This product targets individuals like myself who want thinner slices and for the cheese to last much longer, especially given the amount of calories in a slice. It's made of good quality stainless steel with a sufficiently long handle that's made of 'TPR' which appears to look and feel a lot like normal plastic but with a thin, rubbery exterior.I've been using this for nearly a week and have found it to work well, creating well formed, sufficiently thick slices which were ideal for our sandwiches. Admittedly, it does not scream high quality, especially given the price point but its certainly a good performer.

This product was sent to me by the seller to review and comes in a plain cardboard box.It's about the same size as a 1L / 35oz milk carton in length and is made of quite good quality stainless steel and plastic (not BPA free) and is reasonably heavy given the size.Each end has 3 sections and to fill them up you need to unscrew the lower (towards the middle) section of each and to dispense the salt, pepper, spices etc you need to twist off the upper portion. The centre portion of the lids cannot come off but can twist.In use I found that this worked well enough and I did not experience any problems with it. We invited several friends around recently for dinner and the overall feedback that I had was more positive than negative. It certainly offers something different.

This product set was sent to me for review and I must admit that I was a bit hesitant at first to accept their kind offer as we are currently trying to cut down on the amount of items we have in our kitchen drawers. We only have a tiny kitchen!.They come in a single plastic bag and are quite good quality. Stainless steel is present in large amounts with TPR hard plastic making a much less of a contribution.The large slicer has a fit for purpose design and is relatively lightweight. If you have used one of these before you will find that this one is easy to use, aided by the thumb grip and it worked well in use. If you haven't used one then patience will be required!.The smaller knife is in fact tiny and very sharp with a thick and small handle, just about big enough to hold with enough grip whilst avoiding the blade. This too did a good job at cutting cheese and they both came out 'unscaved' from the dishwasher.

I decided to buy this product and another 2 seitan brands from Amazon during the spring of 2013 as I had temporarily switched to a vegan diet and found it challenging at the time to find a suitable protein source that I could have with salads etc (I had very limited cooking skills). For anyone that has never heard of this product Seitan is a type of textured vegetable protein made from wheat gluten, used as a meat substitute.Because it's suspended in a watery solution the seitan looked very fresh when I removed it and I cooked it in virgin olive oil at a temperature setting of 4 from 6 in the frying pan. When it started to harden I added a variety of spices to it (garlic, turmeric, parsley and sage) and kept on turning it until it just started to turn dark brown. Total cooking time was about 10 minutes. If you leave it for longer it will dry out. I added it to a normal salad with himalayan salt, pepper and I really enjoyed it.I also cooked it without any spices but the taste was very, bland therefore I believe that it is a must that herbs & spices are added (add the ones that you enjoy the most). My favourite 2 to date are curry powder and turmeric although adding too much can make me cough repeatedly.In summary, this product is an decent tasting meat substitute when added with herbs and spices etc. I also believe that it is healthier and easier to digest than meat.I also bought 2 other seitans at a similar time (as mentioned earlier) and I found them both to be more or less identical in appearance, texture etc so I cooked them the same way with the same herbs etc. I still found them all to taste very similar if not identical and I concluded that all seitan might taste very similar.(For that reason my 3 seitan reviews will sound quite similar. I usually buy the one that offers best value at the time).

I've enjoyed using clay masks for years.  I use one every couple of weeks to keep up with my oily skin.  First Botany is a great brand.  I like that you only need to  apply a small amount to get results.  The mask dry's fairly quick and there is no smell.  It's fairly easy to remove.  I didn't get irritation from using the product and it has continued to help keep my oily skin soft and clear.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

My dad absolutely loves this.  He loves to shave and has always shaved the old fashioned way.  He's never used electric shavers.  The razor works great and he has the close shave that he wants everyday.  The set looks nice and he gladly displays in on the bathroom sink.  This would make a great gift to anyone who shaves the old fashioned way.  The set comes in a very nice box for gift giving.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

My husband has been rolling his own cigarettes for a couple of months.  He's been using a manual roller and only rolls a few cigarettes at a time.  It's time-consuming and I was afraid he would get burned out on rolling so I've been looking for an electric roller for him.  The electric roller has been working very well for him.  It's pretty easy to use and he's been rolling in his pack and a half in the morning while having coffee.  The machine doesn't jam or waste tobacco and it's easy to clean the store.  I received this product at a discount to review and give my honest opinion.

I have taken Flaxseed for a few years now.  I started taking it to help with my dry skin and hair especially in the winter.  I'm also happy that it helps with cholesterol and  heart disease.  I like the supplement.  They are small soft gels.  There is no smell or after taste.  I have read that when choosing a brand of flaxseed supplement to make sure that it's cold pressed and organic.  It also says to they should be in a dark bottle.  This seems to be a great brand.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

This phone case is great for our phones when we go on the boat or swimming.  I don't have to worry about water splashing on our phones.  The case is made well and I can still use my phone while it's in the case.  The color is nice also.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

These tongs are great.  They work very well in the kitchen to grab salad and hot foods.  I also use them on the grill when we cook steak.  They hold the meat well without tearing it.  The tongs are easy to clean and they clip closed at the end so they are also easy to store.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

I like that these headphones are very comfortable to wear.  They are bluetooth and they connected to my phone very easily.  They have great sound and are durable.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

These are great brushes for applying eye makeup.  I like that they have nice long handles.  They are comfortable to use and the brushes are made well.  No fibers have fallen out.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

This is a very nicely made garlic press. We only use fresh garlic in our food and we us lots.  The press is made well and it's comfortable to use.  We also smashed some walnuts with it and it worked great.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

Great chargers for my Samsung Galaxy 5.  They fit great.  Easy to attach and they charge great.  I like that I got 2 in the set and they work great.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

This set of brushes is awesome.  They are made well and none of the fibers are falling out.  I really like how they feel in my hand.  They are comfortable and accurate.  They come in a nice bag and look great.  They would make a nice gift.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

I've been and a healthy eating diet for about a month and have had good results.  What really keeps me going and give me motivation is to see the results.  This Body Tape Measure really helps me keep motivated.  I know I feel better but sometimes I have those days where I wonder if it worth it.  What I've also discovered is when I work out I might now show weight loss on the scale but this tape measure shows my loss and that keeps me going.  The Body Tape is fairly easy to use.  The more you use it the easier it gets.  I am tracking my stomach, arms and thighs.  Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. ***I received this product free/discount to use and give my honest review.

I am very happy with this blood pressure monitor.  It's very easy to use and easy to read.I really like that the monitor will store 180 readings.  That's a great for us to average our reading.  It's also a good way to see if changing our eating habits and taking certain supplements are working for us.What I like best is that the monitor is for 2 people.  Me and my husband are both using it and it stores both of our readings. The monitor will store and average 90 readings for each of us.The monitor comes in a nice case so it's easy to take it with us. I love this serum and it definitely gets 5 stars! I am more than pleased with this product and would recommend it to others! If you did not find it helpful, please let me know how my review could become more beneficial by leaving me a comment.

I recently reread this story together after rereading the 3 preceding books in the series. Sadly I didn't enjoy this one nearly as much. There are lots of other summaries and reviews so I'll just say that this one was too modern in feeling, I felt like it was the Regency version of "Criminal Minds". The dialogue between the main characters had lots of modern moment that were jarring too. I wonder if the author wasn't pressed by a deadline to finish this book - it would explain so much.

This author has the ability to write very different main characters in each book in a series - I think that it's a gift! There are loads of summaries and reviews so I'll just say that I loved the way the h loved her husband and had absolute faith in their love (even though the H never loved her in the beginning) - it was so sweet. I think Ms Garwood handled the change in the relationship between the two very well even if she used a plot device I'm not keen on - the hea was very good. I thoroughly enjoyed this story.

I recently reread this book as I read it ages ago and I enjoyed it the second time around. I like the way this author writes and her main characters were as good as the ones in the first book in the series. There are loads of reviews and summaries but I'll just say that I loved the way the h led the H a merry dance at the beginning. I liked that the h was strong without being overbearing. The secondary characters added depth to the story and some of them get to have their own books later in the series.

I quite enjoyed this story after I got past the first half. As others have said, the h was way too managing and strident for me in the beginning. I'm not fond of a shrewish h even though I understood she had a heavy load bringing up her large family by herself with very little money. The H comes along to deliver the sad news that the h's brother died in the war. Although he didn't know the brother very well, he was asked to deliver some letters and money to the h. They get off to a difficult start and when the H offers a marriage of convenience, the h suggests that he ask her sister instead. Once we got past all of this I began to enjoy the story more as the interactions between the main characters were better. The H seemed to manage her better and she didn't come off as shrewish as she had been for the first part of the story. I liked the fact that this was a clean and traditional book. It's a pity that there were so many errors that I assume were made when converting this book to Kindle format.

I picked this up as a freebie and was really surprised to find that it is a very short story (2 chapters). I think it had some good elements that would have been better developed in a longer story (even a novella). There is nothing more to add about the story, other than what the Amazon summary gives already.

I really enjoyed this Christmas-themed short story about an Earl meeting the sister of one of his injured guests. The h's twin brother is injured in a hunting accident and loses his sight temporarily so the main characters begin corresponding. The brother talks the H into coming home with him for Christmas. The h is having a hard time because she lost her mother a year ago and her father is still mourning. She is responsible for everything in the house and she has been unable to have her season because she was nursing her ailing mother. There is a mild element of paranormal with a ghost but it didn't detract from this lovely story

I really didn't find this story sweet at all. Firstly it is riddled with errors, which usually only get on my nerves when I'm not fully involved in the story (as was the case here). The author switches words e.g. stroke instead of stoke, ring instead of wring and she misspells e.g Cane instead of Cain (and Abel). She also has the dubious honour of using a swear word that I don't believe I've ever read in a Regency before and hope never to read again. Aside from that the word 'wh**e) appears on nearly every page and got on my nerves. I realise I sound like a prude and maybe I am but I read romance for escapism not for crudity. The story itself was also fairly weak in my opinion, the middle bit where they were travelling to London really dragged on.+++Spoilers+++Finally the ending requires a leap of imagination since I doubt it would ever have happened in those times. After the H took the h's innocence and he was the illegitimate son of a traitor, I'm pretty sure the h's family would have taken his life in those days instead of happily overlooking all of that and allowing him to marry the h.

I read this book years ago before I began doing reviews and decided to reread it. It's one of those books that can be reread without losing it's initial appeal. I loved that this had a h with a difference. When she was a child she was raised by Native Americans and then sent back to England in accordance with her late mother's wishes. When the main characters meet the H is intrigued by the h and the strange things she says. The H was burned by his first marriage and is not keen to remarry again - ever. This being a romance of course means he doesn't always get what he wants. I loved it and must say it is well worth reading

This is one of those times when I'm going to disagree with my friends regarding a book (some of the other reviewers) because I didn't love it. Let me clarify immediately by saying that I don't like second chance love stories as a rule, and there are 2 of them in this 3 novella book. Obviously Ms Balogh writes very well and that saves this effort.Please don't read any further unless you want to know what I disliked enough to spoil the stories.+++Spoilers+++I don't like second chance love stories and I really hate infidelity even more. Both stories contain adultery. The first story had a particular set of circumstances and was easier to stomach than the third. Both stories were about married couples seeing each other for the first time after years of estrangement. However the fact that in both cases the husbands never sought out their wives sooner to sort things out again spoilt the stories. The third story also contained a paranormal element that might annoy some readers. The middle story wasn't terrible but it was a bit "insta" to be very believable given the H's history and some of his thoughts about his mistress.Nothing this author writes is ever terrible and if you can live with the above then you'll enjoy this compilation

I bought this book ages ago and before I began doing reviews. I recently reread it after rereading the series and I really enjoyed this one. I loved both main characters even though the h was quite a handful (but we knew this from previous books). I loved the way the author developed the love story throughout the book. I sighed a happy sigh when I got to the end.

I recently reread this book and remembered why it wasn't a favourite. I think this story deserves 3.5 stars but I rounded it up to 4 because of the excellent last few chapters. There are already loads of reviews so I will just say that for me the first half of the book was not wonderful because we get the feeling that H wants to marry the h so that his children get a mother. i wanted him to be more romantic towards the h but the ending more than makes up for this. There is a fabulous scene towards the end where the H explains his concept of their marriage - I cried. This book is worth reading for that scene alone

I read this book ages ago and before I began doing reviews. I've been going through the many books I've purchased by this author and rereading them. This one was in my favourites file but I've decided that although it's good, it's not that good. There were some funny moments along the way and the secondary character, Lady Danby, steals the show a little. The main characters were nice enough and the story idea is a good one but there was a little something missing. There are loads of summaries so I'll just say that it's worth reading and I might go back and buy the first book in the series now.

This bundle by Authors Regina Duke and Sandra Edwards, has the distinction of being the first book that I'm returning without finishing. I read the first 2 stories by Ms Duke and noticed that I'd already read Ms Edwards first story. The plots are not credible, I found reading the stories an incredible chore and not even skimming helped. I gave up

Reading this again a few years after I originally bought and read it, didn't improve the story. Coming after one of my all time favourites 'A Devil in Winter' didn't help either. There are hundreds of reviews so I'll just say that the main characters were a bit underdeveloped and Lily, the h from book 2 was even more unlikeable than she was in her own book. She was domineering and bossy and totally detracted from the romance. I'd only recommend this book if you're invested in the series like I was

As others have already summarised and said, this book contains short stories about characters who have appeared in the authors series. I thoroughly enjoyed the Kleypas and Quinn offerings but I didn't love the MacGregor story about Simon, who was a wonderful secondary character in her other books in the series. Anyway if you like me want to find out what happens and keep up with existing series, then you'll want to read this collection of novellas.

I've read this story several times and it still remains a favourite. I've never reviewed it so I'll just say that it was a wonderful love story with an imperfect H. There were misunderstandings, which I don't like but I think worked in this book because of the H is a tortured soul and his issues needed to be dealt with. There are hundreds of reviews so I'll just say that this book is well worth reading and I'm glad that the author didn't distract us with the secondary characters stories, even though this is the first in the Bridgerton series.

I'm busy rereading this series and as I didn't do a review when I first read it, I'll do a quick one now. There are loads of summaries with details of the story so I'll just say that whilst I enjoyed this book, I found it irritating that the H never really redeems himself for all of the awful stuff he said to the h. We know she's the plain older sister to a very beautiful and intelligent deb whom the H decides he wants to marry. In the end because he compromises the h, he is pressurised into marrying her. The h always feels like his second choice and I really think she deserved the words from him to make up for how awful he was to her in the beginning. Aside from that it is a lovely story if you can look past the h always being in her sister's shadow.

This is possibly my least favourite of all the author's books that I've read.
